clean_story:
As some know here I decided to go and get a real job like my wife had been suggesting

You know a W No I dont care if you dont want to flip burgers 

Well I thought that I was doing pretty well driving Uber after expenses still about what I earned as a paramedic but my  Civic hit k and gas prices are through the roof

So real job

Back to EMS Still a maybe But Im not in my s anymore a touch of PTSD and two hernias

Back to programming Competitive also for the young and I do not want to be behind a desk

Law enforcement That was on my horizon before we moved to the big city and stuff happened

So one night I decided to send a Facebook message to a limousine company that I first noticed before I started rideshare full time brand new to the city life Instant reply I was hired on the spot two days later

First vehicle I drove was a Chrysler  Brakes were shot Second another  tires were bald and one had an enormous chunk of rubber missing

Soul searched for about three days and posted here Decided to give them the benefit of doubt just as I would want emailed them basically saying that they are awesome but I cant drive unsafe shit

Owners girlfriend stepped in took care of everything like a boss and I am now driving their best The pandemic nearly killed their business that section of the fleet is just now becoming more in demand

Now Winifred She had just become a regular when I started  very well to do First trip was from an independent care facility now assisted living unit shes not happy to the afternoon Mass

I was warned in advance and given a salute by her last driver before I headed to pick her up  third trip for the company Very demanding pax and she needs a lot of help getting in and out of the car

She asked me to do five things at once said shes old enough to be my grandmother Moms her age AC was either too hot or too cold and made me pull over to find the right radio station All in the first five minutes 

First time waiting for a pax on the job People were commenting on the fancy car parked by the door to the church It was her first Mass since the pandemic began

After I got her situated in the car again she started to apologize for how she acted before I cut her off Told her that I know chronic pain when I see it arthritic obese and how it can definitely  with your mood And I told her to stop calling herself old

Dropped her off called the company and told them that if Winifred ever needs a ride to PLEASE let me know And she requested me for her next trip

Mass again yesterday this time I joined her Boss asked if we needed to charge extra for an escort 

And thats my Sunday moving forward Paid a decent amount to drive a friend Winifred said Id better not think of her as a pax to church and back

Oh and here I am picking up her phone off of the road yesterday because I put it on the roof and forgot Not a scratch Divine intervention




Rideshare has been either extremely profitable here or less than minimum wage just seems to be how the wind blows Tips are pretty much unheard of pick up distance is still pretty high for most pings Pax are still left stranded at our airport

Even though Im not totally down with it seems a bit low I earn hr from when I leave the garage that can be home if the car isnt needed before or between trips until I return

unlike Uber and Lyft tips are included minimum of   and many fares are  So no dead miles and no expenses Lately driving a  Lincoln MKT  Continental  Suburban and soon a  Continental

Pax run the gamut from Winifred to newlyweds executives flight crews airport to hotel and back organ transplant teams and  last week  a show creator for AMC followed by his lead actor

I was star struck enough then had the surreal experience of the main man behind the show asking me to stop so he could literally run a block to an ATM so he could tip me  cash in addition to the  or so included short airport run

In conclusion companies like this are hiring Oh rideshare drivers are un employable  bullshit I submitted a resume showed up on time wearing a suit heres where the keys are water bottles are over there when can you start  that was the interview

So if you are burnt out being an ant hate that term but whatever consider the option And Im part time for now still anting on and off

My theme song right now
Name: Benjamin M

clean_story:
I get a request for a  minute trip on Uber to pick up at Chipotle I get there and the place is deserted I dont think it was actually open yet save for a man sitting at one of the outside tables The guy looked a bit poor  like your normal lower class service worker here really

The guy gets in and immediately slams my door but apologizes right away Fair play I think to myself At least he apologized He ended up being a pretty good passenger and he asked me a lot about Uber I think this might have been his first Uber ride

At the destination I end the trip and explain that it should pop up on his phone in a minute or so with a record of the trip and what it cost About  seconds later he tells me that he tipped me  and would have tipped more but that was the most they would allow 

It occurs to me that this gig would be very different if every passenger tipped like him Also dont judge a book by the cover Sometimes what looks like a bad trip can actually end up being really good I get the feeling the guy tried to tip me
Name: touberornottouber

clean_story: Ive been driving in the Charlottesville Virginia area since the fall of  I have taken rides to Richmond Harrisonburg and Stanton and picked up rides in those areas on the way back Ive also gone as far North as Culpeper but did not get any pings on the way back from there My understanding has always been that if I were to take a longer trip for example to Dulles airport that I could set my destination to return and possibly get trips along the way I have never done this because it doesnt seem to make sense financially Is too much time and too many dead miles Ive always assumed that Im not authorized to drive in that area other than in a return situation Yesterday I had a conversation with support about my annual inspection I uploaded the new certificate and they did not automatically lift the hold I had to call them After the rep helps me out she did confirm that my area includes anywhere in Virginia She also said that if I can go online that means I can get trips My wife and I are in NoVA DC and Maryland  to  days a week for her work I always play with the app to look at surges and so forth and I have always been able to go online in those areas I havent tried to actually take trips or pings simply because Ive never been in my car Im always in my wifes company car but theoretically I COULD take my car I spend  hours amusing myself while she works the idea is tempting except for the problem of putting huge miles on my car just for a few bucks Support has told me quite a number of incorrect things in the past so is this person correct or is this person confused Is it true that if you can go online you will get pings When my inspection was expired for the last several days I could still go online  I just wasnt getting any pings So that tends to refute the information that support told me already Thoughts

I am in line and there is this middle ages black guy in front of me In front of him was this overweight guy As the overweight customer is getting rung up he all of a sudden went on some kind of fart storm Like if you ate a lot of chili with beans in it and you just have a lot of gas with no expectation of using the bathroom Just pressure and air

So it basically went like this
loud fart sound then stops
Oh god sorry im really sorry
more fart sounds after that then stop
Oh geez I am really sorry like oh my fart sound god
more farting

The black guy in front of me turns around with such a disgusted look on his face like he was in the car driving past the sewage treatment plant on a hot day with the windows down

Then he speaks LOUDLY while also using his hands in an explaining way
black guy voice with actual tactful pausing
You know it smells like someone is taking a poop right here
points down with two fingers
Like I am standing in the bathroom stall right next to the guy who has food poisoning and taking a massive diarrhea dump

I busted out laughing so hard I had to grab the chip rack to keep me from falling The entire store was laughing hysterically The farting guy left real fast all embarrassed It did stink in that general area from the farts When the black guy gets up to the counter to pay a woman behind me walks past me and offers to pay and thanks him for making her laugh so hard it made her day

I guess I mean it was sad for the farting guy but the entire situation itself was funny I wish that black guy was on TV like doing stand up What a funny guy He played it straight right after that just kinda looking at everyone like come on now this guy Haha
Name: The Jax

clean_story:
Uber badly wants me to drive again It keeps sending incentive notices to my inbox So as it happens I have been driving Since last in the saddle I have lost Gold status and my ability to see the destination of a ride request is now based upon the newish accepting  of  ride requests algo

On the surface the of algo seems to me like a halfway decent compromise giving drivers up front details if they simply maintain a  acceptance rate Of course drivers who accept a smaller percentage of rides will note that the low pay makes the of algo a joke But even in my locale where Uber still pays  cents a mile and  cents a minute the of algo is a clown act As anyone who has focused on the algo knows acceptance rate is based upon each individual ride request rather than on passenger request

The downside of this nuanced difference played out for me yesterday with Darren Darren wanted a ride Badly His request for a long ride on the Lyft platform came to me and I declined it For my own good reasons I was unable to accommodate a pax who wanted a ride out of town After all I am an Independent Contractor and it is my right to choose which rides work for me Darren then came in on the Uber app which I also declined lowering my  of  acceptance rate one notch Undaunted for the next half hour Darren toggled back and forth between platforms requesting his outoftown ride

Uber in all its wisdom kept sending me Darrens requests The algo was too dumb to realize that if I turned the request down once nothing was going to change  minutes later But the requests kept coming and I noticed my acceptance rate was dropping with each successive decline Finally while on another ride Darrens request came in again Only this time there was no destination I didnt realize the request was from stubborn Darren and stupidly accepted it

I drive the  minutes to the pickup point then down a  mile dirt road which cakes the back of my freshly washed car with dust only to realize after starting the ride that my pax was the now infamous Darren Darren Im so sorry I cant drive you to xxx I know theres not a lot of Uber cars on duty right now being that a lot of drivers are still preferring UI but I just cant do it Darren whose family is just starting up a pot farm replies in a most mellow way that it is totally cool and to just drop him back to his pickup location I do and move on

Uber Dude I just want a reasonable driving experience Anything less than that and you are deincentivizing me Get it






And by the way cancelling  out of  rides is a  cancellation rate Not the  you are showing on my account
Name: _Tron_

This time before I arrived to that pickup I hit stop new requests After that drop off I went to see what I was being paid for each trip Basically looking for a surge No surge to be had Screen also did not show any surge zones Went back online and immediately received a ping After starting that trip I got a ping for a stacked ride Accepted it Dropped of PAX and headed to next pickup Started that trip no ping for a stacked trip Ended that ride and sure enough had another ping auto added Hit last ride Finished the final trip and said screw it Uber to cheap to be charging and paying a surge I went home

clean_story: We have been having promotions every day  per ride so our small downtown area where the promotion applies is flooded with drivers You can sit around and wait for one of the promo rides or if you want to make money you can take what comes your way and hopefully a few of the very short  rides will come your way as well Yesterday I took a  minute pick up at our airport for a  minute ride Normally and especially during these promotions I get in touch with the rider and make sure that he is coming back towards the downtown area  of the time that would be the case if they say theyre going North or West towards Harrisonburg I would probably cancel I dont want to end up  minutes away from the downtown area and possibly deadhead all the way back In this case I got no answer on my text and assuming that the guy was probably waiting for his bag or just on the phone I went ahead to the pick up anyway Surprise Going north to Ruckersville Shit Oh well Took him home  ride and  tip OK Set destination back to downtown and luckily got two trips along the return one short and one all the way back downtown Both of these tipped feeling lucky and good at this point Then I got the phone call My airport passenger thinks he left his phone in my car I look around the back and there it is under the seat on the side where he dropped it His girlfriend is smoking hot and not shy by the way Kids this is why you should lock your phones So I made the honest and well intentioned mistake of telling him that I found it This nice guy with the hot girlfriend immediately turned into an entitled jerk and demanded that I return my property to him at his house which is now more than  minutes away from my location At this point I had already accepted another trip so I told him to call me back in half an hour A few minutes later I got in touch with support and they confirmed to me that since I had informed the passenger and Uber that I found his property I was now obligated to return it to him Good Lord what a freaking nightmare Surge popping up on top of the promotion in the downtown area its heating up as people are starting to return to their hotels and homes from going out to eat Im going to miss making some really good money if I drive all the way out to this dudes house again He calls me again for the th time He is getting upset and is very pushy continues to demand that I drive to his home and return his property I push my luck and fib tell him that I cannot possibly drive all the way to Ruckersville as Im at the end of my shift After a near meltdown he acquiesces and agrees to meet me half way I suggest Walmart and he finally agrees Walmart is fortunately much farther for him than for me so I came out OK on this Drove to Walmart did a little shopping met the guy in front returned his phone and he didnt say a word no thank you nothing What a jerk and lesson learned never again will I admit to finding a phone from a distant drop off and never again will I drop anyone off at a distance without thoroughly checking around the back seat After over  trips I know better this was a stupid mistake But I got my  returned item fee and after another long talk with support they also added a bonus  promotion to my account
Name: Cvillegordo

clean_story:
I picked up an Uber Eats order from a discount restaurant

As Im about to arrive at the customers apartment a phone call comes in I figure its the customer who wants to give me special instructions to get to their place so I answer

Turns out its the restaurant manager He said he was not watching the front desk and his employee forgot to give me the drinks that went with the order

I tell him to refund the drinks and Im not coming back because I dont get paid to go back and deliver the drinks and besides its his employees responsibility to give me the correct order

He tells me its between the customer and Uber and its my responsibility to get the order right too I tell him not only was his employee rude but not to blame me for his employees mistake

He tells me to tell the customer that I forgot his drinks I tell him Im done talking to him to have a good night and hang up the phone At this point Im pretty irritated and basically had already raised my voice when he blamed me for the mistake

Yeah I know I could have checked for drinks but when an employee hands me an order Im going to assume its correct Every once in a while I do check orders for drinks and occassionally I do catch errors but Im not going to waste my time and check the accuracy of orders everytime especially if  of the time the orders are correct anyway which is my satisfaction rate after this order

What I didnt realize until I hung up is that the restaurant can actually give you negative feedback and when I checked my rating for deliveries sure enough the manager dinged me Apparently the customer dinged me tooabout  minutes after I checked my rating from the merchant my customer satisfaction rating had dropped from  to which I suspect happened when the customer called the restaurant and the manager blamed me for the mistake

Anyway I came really close for telling the manager to F Off so Im glad I kept my cool 

So if you ever find yourself of the situation first off dont be an idiot like me and answer your phone like I did and if you do answer the phone be careful what you say to the store manager Having said that you arent a store employee and if they try to blame you for their employee screwing up tell them to shove it because at the end of the day its on them and not you
Name: Haanjo

clean_story:
Dear Ridershare Passengers

When Im waiting for you I will wait  minutes Not  minutes and one second  minutes is  minutes I only get paid roughly  cents per minute of wait time and while Im waiting for you Im missing out on other rides 

And dont say you will tip me extra because often people who say that dont tip at all For the record sometimes I get paid more for cancelling the ride than I do for the ride itself and keep in mind Im often parked in an odd spot waiting for you sometimes blocking traffic and sometimes dealing with drunk idiots who are trying to steal your ride

And for the record I understand that sometimes you need to pay your tab at the bar before you can leave I get that But you had a  minute notice for me to get there while I was finishing up my last ride plus another  minute notice while I was on my way to pick you up after dropping off my last passenger

So there is no excuse to not be waiting at the curb when I pull up And for the record when I started doing rideshare three and a half years ago I used to bend over backwards for my passengers like you But often five minutes would turn into ten minutes and when I bent over backwards for my passengers the most you would be a bad passenger things would go terribly wrong on the ride and you would give me a one star rating for my efforts

Over  rides later Ive learned from riders like you 

When you say stuff like

Be right there

What you really mean is that you are going to be late And if Ive been patient enough to wait for you for the entire  minutes and beyond no you cant smoke a cigarette before we leaveget in the freaking car

So there you have it Id like to be a nice guy and wait but you need to show some courtesy and respect for your driver and not sit there and socialize with your friend up until the last possible second because once I hit the gas pedal and start to take off its too late and yelling at me to come back isnt going to change things

And for the record it took something like  rides with  late passengers to develop this attitude Bottom line is Im not messing around anymore So be ready

Love 

Your DriverVrrrooooooom
Name: Haanjo

I had just dropped a rider and was on the highway out of the airport when a call came in requesting a ride at the airport The fact that I got that call indicates that there were NO Uber drivers in the Quewaiting for potential
riders I accepted the call picked up the couple and took them to their destination Here is my punishmentI will not be able to receive any ride requests to or from the Airport for  days BooHoo As an Uber driver I had every right to return to the Airport to make that pickup Uber is so fastidious about every rule and regulation without regard to common sense
Name: The super uber

clean_story:
Now driving for  years I am on my th car Ubering can be a dangerous job My first  cars were destroyed by others making driving mistakes Cars today are nothing but pieces of plastic When you are hit pieces fall off and insurance companies are quick to declare A total loss In  cases Uber insurance handled the accident In the first I had a Uber passenger and in the second I was in route to pick up a rider There was no medical involved Ubers deductible is  and mine is  My insurance sent me a check for  Now my th vehicle a hybrid  I used in the winter months trying to travel up steep hills covered in Ice and snow The hybrid constantly shifted from gas to electric and back putting excessive strain on the combustion engine Bottom line I burned out the engineKaput Finito gone I had the car towed to the dealer to confirm my worst thoughtthe engine was DOA The dealer mentioned that there was a recall on this particular model yearthe bearings were wearing unnecessarily fast The dealer contacted the Hyundai factory   their email to the dealer was very short and sweet GIVE THE CUSTOMER A NEW ENGINEAT NO CHARGE
Now I have a  vehicle with  miles and a new engine My total mileage from pickup to drop off and drop off to pickup in  was  miles
Name: The super uber

clean_story:
Pax have been holding court talking smack and spilling the tea so to say about all the kinds of drivers they really dont like and why they give one stars and complaints 

Here are some most common categories pax seem to talk about

 The oddball Sure it goes without saying that RS would attract its share of societys outliers ie those who need to pay the bills but cant manage a W gig but some seem to take it one step beyond to the point of turning off or even freaking out pax Stand out examples according to pax include one guy who had a pit bull riding shotgun service dog who knows a woman who kept addressing a male pax as Martha even after he corrected her and another lady who had the inside of her car decked out with pulsing disco lights 

 The maniac on the streets Its one thing to drive like a bat out of hell to hustle to the drop off ASAP but completely another to almost cause multiple accidents get into an unsparring amount of altercations both verbal and physical with other drivers on the road until pax pleads to end the ride early and be let off at the nearest corner Not good for The Community

 The slob No pax likes getting into strangers car which looks and smells like a junk yard Even if their own car is that way or worse they wont tolerate it when Ubering or Lyfting pax complain the some drivers car get super gross and they have roll the windows because of the funky odordrivers grouse about pax eating in their cars but a number of drivers as reported by pax are the ones munching away with a sandwich andor burrito in hand while driving food slipping everywhere Clearly a one star ride there 

 The antisocial introvert Many of us yours truly included remain open to talking shop with a pax about this and that to establish rapport to pull down a tip So its surprising how many drivers dont work that tip and instead simply unlock the door set the GPS and drive in total silence arrive unlock door doneno greeting and welcome confirmation of name and destination hows it going etc nothing And Im not talking about members of the Deaf Community who are drivingI mean the folks who take the whole our job is just to just to drive pax from point A to point B ethos a bit too literally One pax recounted how they get into the car told her driver good morning and received a grunt as a response followed by glowering stare through the mirror She canceled the ride I might have too 

Do any of you fill into these groups

Or

Can anyone add to this list
Name: #1husler

clean_story:
Reflecting back on  years into the game but is it I took massive time off in  due to the pandemic Ride share requests had dropped dramatically in late March  

I would say the respect from my friends went way down since ive become a rideshare driver I would say overall my happiness went way up though

Moneywise Id say this gig isnt worth it I think we pay too much fixing our cars and putting gas into them My previous job didnt pay that much though So its not like I left a K job for this or something Also you dont get alot of time off doing rideshare People dont respect rideshare drivers and we put alot of work into it Honestly I cant say I blame them after taking a few rides from other drivers 

Running into people I used to know was a pretty big highlight for me I helped a friend go  miles down the road the one day I guess not a friend but someone who went to elementary school with me It was weird he was literally  miles from the school we went to Then months later I ran into someone else I knew and we decided to have dinner That was pretty cool and one of the few times I left the car 

Another time some guys from a small town Illomois decided to make a stop at Wendys and I was hungry too Lol we all had lunch together Then just dropped them off at a theme park after we ate

He explodes Mthrfking racists mthrfkr You just hate black people You mthrfking racist This rant continued and got louder and he wasnt moving I stepped out and called  They realize what Im doing get out he continues the rant and it now progresses into threats I get in drive across the street tell dispatch the threat is over and no need to respond then I call the Uber safety line and tell them what happened

Mind you I have a soft spot for disabled and special needs people My daughter is one Got a ping and rolled up to pick up a lady that was crippled by cerebral palsy sitting on a bench in the hot sun Helped her in the car and started the ride Two blocks down the road to a lawyers office to drop off a form She said she didnt know how to add a stop so I showed her on the app and she said she needed to go home   hours away in afternoon ATL traffic She was very tired and I knew she wouldnt get a ride any time soon at that time of day so I said add a good tip and I would do it She agreed and off we went together her talking non stop all the way I even stopped and bought her a water I helped her to her door and turned around for an hour dead leg back to ATL 
Yep no tip I feel like I got played I think this has been used before with other driversSO NO MATTER WHAT END THE RIDE FIRST
Sometimes it pays to refuse nicely if asked for a big favor Honesty is a rare thing these days I fear But I did my good deed for the day May God bless her shes got way more issues than tipping her drivers

clean_story:
Picked up a guy at a new apartment complex and took him about  minutes up the road this morning 

A couple of minutes into the ride he appeared to be getting agitated sighing etc I did have to go backwards a little bit before heading towards the destination because of the nature of the several lane road etc but nothing too out of the ordinary 

About halfway through the ride he asked if he could roll down the window I said sure no problem and I cracked mine as well to avoid the reverb I asked him if it was too hot and he said no my AC was set to an appropriate level

I dont think he was concerned about COVID because he wasnt wearing a mask until right before he got into my car I did have an almost full cup of very strong coffee but Ive never gotten a complaint about that and even regular compliments on the aroma

I dropped him off at his destination and then it dawned on me the egg salad sandwich I had purchased at a convenience store and placed on the passenger seat was giving off an aroma If he had smelled it through the coffee aroma he probably thought I was a gassy driver I moved the sandwich to the hatchback before picking up my next pax

Waiting for a bad rating or even a complaint but I hope to avoid it He was a  like me so hopefully he gives me the benefit of the doubt

Next time I think I will skip the egg salad sandwich

I was in a hellish part of town the other night in an area with a lot of bars and restaurants Typically the pax just want you to shuttle them from one bar to another which isnt worth the headache But I figured Id go ahead and play the role of good ant and accepted the request 

I find the location of the pickup and decided I didnt want to be that ant and hold up traffic waiting for my pax So I pull off into a side street and wait parked next to the building right at the pincushion I sat there waiting for my pax when  clowns decided for whatever reason to stand right next to my passenger door somewhat inhibiting my view and peoples view of my vehicle Attempted to contact the pax several times no answer 

Five minutes later stupid Comfort  minute wait and still no sign of her Look over and the  jackasses are still just standing there One of the asshats decides he wants to lean his hand on my car to which I slowly put the car in reverse and clip his arm with my side mirror With the windows rolled up I still manage to hear him say You couldve asked I responded in turn with Get off my  car I was actually hoping that theyd start something as I was already getting frustrated by the most likely drunk woman making me wait But they just decided to walk down the street with no drama 

Im not sure what planet that dillhole was from where he actually thought that I needed to ASK him to get off my car Its not a park bench its my personal property ya schmuck 

Waited the full  minutes and decided to just shuffle her Oh well  for nothing My guess is she was trying to catch the last few minutes of a college game and thought Id wait for her past the wait time

Name: Erik M

clean_story:
Actually it was more like  seconds

Last night I had a Lyft pickup at a pool billiards bar at around  am

After about a minute and a half of waiting a guy comes out and says Wow you were fast not realizing he had been in my que for close to  minutes and was less than  miles from my last drop off He then goes back into the bar

At around the  minute mark he comes back out and says he is waiting for his friend and proudly says he will make it worth my while if I wait I simply respond with the universal ok ok At that point I explain to him that he has about  secondsand he runs into the bar to get his friend

The clock ticks down to zero and he still hasnt shown up so naturally I bolt With around  Uber and Lyft rides to date I no longer mess around Im serious when I say you have  seconds

As I take off I hear him yell That wasnt  seconds sir but the reality is that it was closer to  secondsor more accurately  minutes and five seconds or so

I dont get why so many people take so long to get ready In my case whenever I book Lyft ride Im ready before the driver gets to my pickup location In this case I get that my rider was probably finishing up a game of pool but at this stage of the game I dont put up with the BS I put up with when I was a new driver and I wont hesitate to leave you behind if you are not ready or if you chose to socialize with your friends for even  minutesI will not hesitate to leave you behind if you dont give me the same respect as I given other Lyft drivers when they pick me up

Do you feel the same way

Picked up at the airport pax got in after I loaded  heavy suitcases Nice enough lady and we headed out for about a  minute trip Her rear window was  open and told her that she could control the window any way she preferred She said she was OK with it open Since the trip was nearly all on the highway I did mention that she may want to close it I didnt think I had to explain the noise factor and other issues when your vehicle is traveling mph with a window open 

The window stayed open the entire way Since the conditions were not conducive to any type of conversation the entire trip was silent 

Arrived at the destination unloaded her luggage and that was it 

I had been mulling over the entire ride how I was going to rate Keep in mind that I nearly always rate a  At least  of the time My annoyance factor on this ride was essentially  The window issue and  I was SURE no tip would be included After all I am an experienced UBER driver who has been through this crap before Thus I rated her a  UBER asks why and I just selected other 
You guessed it she tipped  I did hit the thanks for the tip button though

clean_story:
Weekend started off bad with my rd trip being and Uber Scammer Ill post more about that in Uber Eats

Had more cancels this past weekend than I have had so far this year

First cancel Friday Night this guy was way to drunk to be getting in my car Here is a series of screen shots from my dash cam Easy pass he actually fell again when he got past my front bumper giving me room to drive off Luckily he fell away from my car

Two more cancels Friday night where PAX texted me just before the  minutes was up that they were on the way I was not in the mood to pick up people that made me wait Waited out timer and drove off with cancel fee Ended up calling it a night out of frustration and headed home

Saturday started out okay Fridays Uber Eats episode still lingering I opted not to turn eats on the rest of the weekend Soon the cancels started rolling in  for the day  PAX cancelled as I arrived at pickup point  I cancelled for No Show The final cancel was this little peach Hard to see her in the picture boy friend is leaning over her as she is puking out her guts Good Bye let someone else deal with that




Last trip Saturday night pickup at a wedding property and take a couple to their resort They were discussing that they need to leave at  AM to get to the airport on time Non eventful  mile trip I head toward my next pickup and see flashing lights in my mirror for a brief second Than nothing Get to my pickup and the guy gets in and says hey someone left their phone Damn bet that was the flashing light I saw Drop them off pretty close to resort I dropped last couple off at Select found item option and previous trip Used call PAX option and sure enough it was his phone as it started ringing Went by their cottage at the resort and knocked on door No answer Oh well left a note on their door to contact Uber Turned phone off and put it in an electronics bag so they could not track it to my house

Get up early Sunday looking for an airport trip or two Get a ping that just looks funny no addresses that I recognize I accept and start to get ready to walk out the door I get a text message saying please call me I call PAX and he tells me where he is at He wants me to come pick him up some  miles away an take him to Aventura some  miles away He proceeds to tell me the app keeps telling him no drivers available where he is at so he kept randomly putting in trips I tell him I cant drive  miles un paid for a trip that will take me  miles from where I live He says tell me what address to put in that is close to where I am at and he will put in a multi stop trip to come get him take him to Aventura and he will take care of my return miles A couple of minutes later I get pickup updated so I continue out the door Trip started  minute from my house to  miles south for first stop

I was passing the resort from PAX that left phone in my car so I stopped and knocked on door again I also had already turned the phone back on to see if they would try and call it My note was still there and I knew they were planning on leaving in about an hour and I would be on a long trip and not able to return the phone No answer Oh well off I go to pickup my PAX About  minutes away from my pickup the left phone rings I answer it and pretty much tell the guy he is out of luck as I was on a long trip Told him I would ask my PAX I was picking up if they minded if I stopped to drop the phone off Told him to call back in  minutes

Get to the stop and a guy comes out and says he needs a few minutes and says thanks for going out of your way and slips me some cash I ask him if he was okay with me dropping of the phone he was sure that is fine I look at the cash he hands me a very very generous tip As Im waiting at his Ocean front house I notice the multiple high end cars couple of antique jeeps  sizeable boats  wave runners and two crotch rockets Man this guy is not hurting for cash at all A few minutes later he comes out with a piece of eye candy in a tight little dress Some back and forth conversation and he gives her an envelope Does not take long to figure out he is a pay to play type guy Lady gets in my car and has a very quite voice with a unique accent He is staying she is going with me he thanks me again She makes a phone call and I realize she is speaking Russian Next thing I know she is laying down in my back seat

Other guys phone rings and I arrange for him to be standing on the side of the road so I can just pull over and hand him the phone  minutes later I get to point he is standing there and I hand him the phone and he hands me  He looks at my PAX in the back seat gets a shocked look and then laughs I look back and her dress has rode up and her ass is just hanging out Yep you guessed it no panties She is sound a sleep

Here is a not so revealing picture after she rolled over and kind of fixed herself Ended up dropping her off outside Trump International Beach Resort where her Im guessing pimp was standing outside a Cadillac Escalade waiting for her




Couple more no show cancels Sunday and no more adventurous pickups

clean_story:
I recently had an interview for a driving job One of the questions posed by the interviewer was

At a junction with a four way stop sign four cars arrive at their respective stop signs at the same time Who has the right of way

Nobody I replied

Incorrect replied the interviewer The correct answer is the driver to your right

Incorrect I replied If four cars arrive at the same time then each car is to the right of another driver meaning that all cars have right of way which in turn means that none of them does  none would have more right than any of the three drivers do

Thats what the California drivers handbook says said the interviewer

Then in this case the handbook is wrong I replied

When I arrive at the same time as another vehicle at a multiway stop sign

 If the other driver is in a BMW or Audi then the driver will believe she automatically goes first so I just let them

 Any other driver they will usually hesitate and dawdle resulting in a Mexican standoff I hit the gas and go

What do you do

clean_story:
Howdy all you Ants On this episode of Id like to discuss the proper construction of your retirement portfolio Since UBER does not provide us with ks it is incumbent upon ourselves to construct a retirement plan that fits our needs Now I am not a certified financial planner no CFP designation but I am an expert in the fields of finance and investing  That said I can provide the board with my approach to investing which may work for some but everyone should do their own research and construct a plan that works for them and helps them achieve their goals all within the confines of their own personal risk appetite

Most importantly and regardless of how you choose to invest your savings an ant  save Various sources will advocate setting aside different percentages of your income in savings Taking that approach is fine but I save as much as humanly possible and likely well above the suggested percentages We  get in the mindset that money is not just a means of exchange it is an asset that can be deployed to earn its own return We  understand the wonders of compounding and how important it is to initiate this plan as early as possible in ones career IRAs can be a useful vehicle to start saving for many of us However some of us will not be able to utilize this structure if you and your old lady make more than k annually

Once the ant has decided to start saving and picked their desired vehicle they must decide how they wish to allocate their capital I am personally a fan of the endowment model popularized by David Swensen while at Yale The problem for most is that it takes a sizeable capital base to be able to deploy this strategy Fear not one can take a modified approach to attempt to match the returns and volatility profile of the endowment model  something FrankieT calls the modified endowment model

Public equities and bonds should be the cornerstone of every ants portfolio I personally use Vanguard ETFs to achieve the desired exposure for very low fees  fees are in this day and age an unnecessary drag on portfolio returns In this bucket beyond your traditional SP  type equities and treasuries or corporate bonds funds you may want to include ETFs that have exposure to emerging markets commodities REITS Collateralized Mortgage Backed Securities BDCs or other assets with solid yields However we must keep in my that dividends are taxed when distributed so this approach may not be the best for folks in high tax brackets Tax efficiencies are an often overlooked aspect of portfolio construction

I addition to these staples I like to add in more esoteric assets in order to mimic the endowment model Some of the easiest ways to get these exposures are to purchase a home which should increase in value rental properties cryptoassets which includes owning mining running masternodes and staking precious metals and music royalties I like to create a bucket for these alternative assets and then distribute this bucket into these other assets mentioned The goal of this approach is to diversify assets minimize correlations minimize volatility provide some passive income through yield and dividends and achieve returns in most market conditions Unfortunately most of us will not have access to LP investments in funds in private equity venture capital or hedge funds  however the right mix of investments can give you similar returns

I think this is a good start as a primer on retirement investing however I would like to open it up to the ants to suggest other favorite investments or investment strategies We are always interested in trying to achieve outsized returns and I believe the collective wisdom of the crowds is the best approach to trying to do so

Thank you and toodles

Frankie
Name: ftupelo

Yesterday afternoon I drove back home during lunch break Ahead of me was a brand new ES with a temporary plate whose driver was waiting for somebody to open the building main gate Obviously the driver doesnt live here as he walked toward me and signalled that he was picking up somebody He is an older gentleman in the late s and politely asked if I could buzz him in Sure I needed to get inside too   

The first thing I realized is his hat that reads US Marine Out of curiosity I asked whether he was still actively serving may be a position of command intelligence or training the newly recruits etc By the time I entered the passcode he said he no longer served and was no different than any other citizen Then I thought we would part our ways after a simply reply with Oh I see When I was about to leave the same car was still parking by the garage gate with hazard lights on I then offered to open the garage gate beside the main gate such that he could wait inside the building He said That is sweet of you but I dont know which floor my  lives

Wait a second did he say  Sorry by any chance are you driving Uber or Lyft I asked Later he told me that it was the second week doing rideshare as a means of distraction from the pain of losing his daughter to TNBC triple negative breast cancer I am so sorry for the loss I know how hard it is to accept the reality of tested negative for all the receptors Before I answered his question about my background I thought it was far more important for him to learn how not to be taken advantage of Sir I know this is not my business but I think you should shuffle and move on It has already been almost  minutes since we first met You should have cancelled the ride Personally I despise any behaviours that abuses the older generations Unlike the cunning deceitful and entitled youth the elder adults are honest and hardworking humans They dont deserve to be treated like this 

After leaving him confused I disclose that I am a former driver This just gets to my nerves how his kindness is abused I left him my contact if he wanted a rideshare  Yes that may sound ignorant to be rideshare mentor as I am nowhere close to how experienced most are on this forum but again he deserves better than this At this paltry rate these lowlives do not deserve a brand new vehicle not to mention a Lexus Allow me to be blunt but you are not going to make money You are basically giving people free rides Although I realize that this is just an activity to keep him occupied it doesnt make any financial sense in any part
Name: MyJessicaLS430

clean_story:
I read posts on this forum and I get the impression that some of you really dont this job and really dont like our customers And I always want to ask Why do you do this By now everyone should realize that Uber is not a great fulltime job  if it ever was By now you cant exactly blame Uber for your particular situation Youve had plenty of time to reevaluate and get out if thats what you want And so again I wonder Why keep doing something you so obviously dislike

Middleaged couple got in the car at a hotel the other morning Black couple but I dont think it matters Woman asks me to pop the truck so I do and then I hop out and help them load their numerous bags As we leave for the short ride to the airport I ask them about their stay and such Just idle chitchat When we get to the airport I hop out and go get one of the little baggage carts they provide This aint New York its pretty chill here and I didnt have another ride stacked

Youre the best Uber driver ever the old guy goes Which I know is not true but he meant it sincerely Our last two drivers ignored uswouldnt help with the bags didnt talk to usmade us feel like we were imposing on him I thanked them and wished them a pleasant trip home By the time I was out of the airport I saw the  tip on top of the  fare

Look this job really isnt that hard or that bad Just be nice to peopletreat them like human beings not some big inconvenience or annoyance If you dont like people perhaps ridesharing is not the field for you If youre not making enough money doing rideshare perhaps its not the field for you And if you resent passengers for not living up to your expectations at the beginning middle or end of the ride perhaps rideshare is not the field for you

Me I happen to love this job Every day I thank God that Uber came along and got me out of driving a taxi which was okay but a lot more work for the money Ive had a lot of fun jobsbut mainly Ive been a helicopter pilot most of my life and doing  job is the most fun Ive ever had No Im not getting rich and Im putting about year on the car which is fine UberLyft gives me about    per month in my bank account I could make more if I wanted to work harder but I dont

Some of you guys really need an attitude check The passengers are not your enemy I wish some drivers would stop treating them as though they are It makes it hard for the rest of us
Name: Aw Jeez

clean_story:
Get a ping for a gated community on Saturday Right away send message asking for gate code I am now keeping a list No response from PAX I was only a minute away and am now at the gate I call the PAX and he answers I say Hi this is FL Keys from Uber Im at the gate and need a gate code He acts all stupid and says he has no idea what I am talking about he didnt order a ride and he is not sure he even has Uber on his phone I say is XXX your address and he says yes I say well someone used your phone to order a ride you need to go in the app and cancel it if you dont want it He barks back I dont have the app on my phone and he is going to end the call I hear a beep and think he ends the call I go to cancel and I hear in the back ground that he is yelling at someone for ordering a ride too soon

At that point I say screw it I need a break and gas anyway Ill leave the ride open and wait for him to cancel

I go get gas go to a fast food place and use the facility BS with the manager a few minutes fill my water cup and head out back on the road See the ride is still active on my phone Decide to drive by the place and a car is pulling out so I sneak through the gate I get close enough to the house to start the timer counting down Around the  minute mark I see another UberLyft car pull up to the house Pick the PAX up and head off 

Finally  minutes is up and I cancel for No Show I was surprised to see the no show fee come up as 

Nice little paid break

Last night I picked up a passenger from a Hospital Emergency Room entrance he was escorted out by a big burly sheriffs deputy and two hospital orderlies big men The passenger was behaving a bit odd from the start and I didnt feel good about taking him but I didnt feel like I could ask him to get out of the car at that point Big lesson learned
His destination was  miles away and he was bouncing off the sides of the vehicle the whole way throwing trash out the window sounding like he was gagging and possibly spitting I just held my breadth and told myself we would be at the destination and it would be over soon We got to the destination and he was laying down on the floor across the passenger and driver area and he would not get out of the car After nearly  minutes I had no choice but to call  He started spitting at things all over the car bringing up mucus and real nasty spit After  minutes of waiting he started to make like a tent in the back seat with his shirt and Id had enough I opened up the back door again and told him that was it he had to get out of my vehicle He lunged up between the seats into the front grabbed my bag of personal items and my cell phone and tried to get away I body slammed him back and he dropped the phone and bag He was pushed back into the car in that exchange and I put my head in and convinced him if he didnt get out it would be bad for him He opened the passenger side door got out and walked away As soon as he was no longer in site the Sheriff deputy showed up I told the deputy what happened and the direction the guy left in The glass back of my Samsung S was shattered the deputy asked if I wanted to file a report on it and I said no not right then Maybe later I reached out to Uber and escalated the situation to a supervisor They are glad Im not hurt wont do anything about the spit no pictures I wiped the nastiness up with a towell and offered me  for my destroyed phone I sent pictures of the phone along with the receipt I buy phones outright it was  I cant press charges because I cant get the passengers information I can only imagine one of my adult daughters being put in this situation

Just had a pax who told me the most painful reason I heard that he had to start taking an Uber A rather young guy in his mid s coming from a friends house He told me that he lost his car and license in Illinois because of unpaid Illinois Tollway fines When I asked him how much he owed his answer shocked me The pax said he owed over  I thought he meant  But he said he just kept on ignoring the fines until the fines multipliedall the while running even more tolls and having them multiply I am not sure how the fines multiply but I am guessing it was not a simple doubling like overdue parking tickets He did say that he was optimistic that he could under the new Illinois law regarding tollway fines to have them significantly reduced under some pandemic assistance relief program

I got my phone out took the pictures and then sent them in to Uber with the damage report I then got the gloves and paper towels out and blotted and dried the stain as much as possible A few hours later the stain had almost gone just leaving a faint outline ring At the end of the night I did the usual routine of Lysol and water cleaning of the seat have to clean the entire seat base to not leave water stains It took about  minutes to clean

clean_story:
Already depressed stressed out and getting fatigued running all over the place for awful pings ENDLESS after starting a trip I accepted a ping  minutes away back downtown from far south in a bad area At least it would get me back to the city The ping only said premium pickup possible with a  surge

Driving there I saw that it was a hospital pick up for a patient These have been prevalent lately especially at JenCare Senior Clinics I did not think much of it usually theyre fairly short but a tip is out of the question because theyre booked by a third party 

I pull up patient is wheeled to my car and belongings are put in the trunk Then I slide start 

 mile trip Already hungry and tired EZ Pass running low and no compensation for  miles to get home 

I turn to the door to hopefully grab the staff they vanished into thin air Called from the app went to the patient 

Apologized to him profusely and escorted him to a bench in front of the door I tried to explain that he would need to tell the hospital that he needed another car and to let the driver know in advance that it was an extremely long trip He did not seem to understand that but did understand why I had to cancel 

Medical staff and patients often seems to think that all we do is medical transport if we pick up at a hospital or clinic They do not understand that were Joe Regular Uber Driver 

And its very frustrating especially after years of doing actual medical transport  including trips such as this but being paid almost hr regardless of dead miles driving a vehicle that doesnt belong to me and not paying for fuel or tolls 

I really hope he got a ride somehow And flipping the bird to Uber for not indicating that this was a  minute trip
Name: Benjamin M

Then enters uberthis week with bonuses im set to make nearly k last week just working the weekend i made kthats unheard of with any job i ever hadname me a job thatll pay  bucks plus a hour with no college degree besides maybe trucking

clean_story:
When I switched from taxi driver to RS I got a lot of grief from some former cabbie friends But as the taxi industry in my city evaporated one of my major critics wisely decided to switch over too He turned in his leased cab bought a little Chevy fourdoor and signed up with Lyft but  Uber for some reason

He did Lyft for a couple of weeks  enjoyed the moneyin versus expensesout This past Monday I texted him and asked how his weekend went Great he said I made  on Saturday and Sunday I thought that was pretty good because Saturday was so rainy that I didnt even drive Then he added But I made all of that delivering food I dont even do Lyft anymore Too much driving

And there you have it Uber and Lyft could not have predicted the rise in fooddelivery services and the need for them during this pandemic which will continue Bottom Line Food delivery drivers make more money with less miles driven They stay local and dont go on any long trips like I did today  trips over to Alabama with a deadhead back because I cannot take Uber  Lyft trips trips in Alabama

I strongly suspect that more and more RS drivers are switching to food for the same reasons as my friend And so I am not surprised that Uber and Lyft have gotten superbusy here in my town where it used to be pretty slow Me Ill stick with passengers The numbers are okay by me and I dont want to deliver food

clean_story:
Had a pickup in downtown Chicago by the Hotel Intercontinental going to Scores Bar a strip club  minutes westbound The pax asked if he could play DMX through my bluetooth DMX is somewhat before the rappers I love like Wiz Khalifa Travis Scott The Weeknd and Cardi Bbut when we listened to it I was happily surprised by his gritty style very real lyrics The next ride from Scores brought me to the west side of Chicago and then the south side

So I listened to him all night and as I mentioned once you get to the west or south side of Chicago you dont often leave the area This is because many drivers will avoid the area or log off once they drop off there Therefore if you get to the area and leave on the app you will stay there all night Many pax who came in were so excited and happy that an Asian would enjoy hip hop rap RB and congratulated me on my musical tastes

I spoke to pax all night regarding DMX his turbulent life and his very depressing death One young lady pax I spoke to said that DMX reminded her of her family a great deal a very high functioning drug user She talked about how her father uses PCP casually and does a good job to help the community and other people She said that drug users should not be stereotyped as criminals The young lady emphasized that once you demonize drugs and make it illegal it glamorizes it and makes rebellious young people get into it more and more

Pax talked about how music unifies and brings the world together and DMX the rapper made incredible music One pax kept using the word GOAT as an acronym to describe DMX GGreatest OOf AAll TTime It was amazing to see the impact that the death of a legendary rapper had on a community like Chicago After my shift I watched some of DMXs acting jobs with Jet Li like in CradleGrave and Romeo Must Die He was a very talented person
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
Like many I started Ubering and was as naive as could be Uber just became legal in NY outside NYC in July of  and because it was brand new both pax and drivers were trying to figure it all out

Shortly after starting to Uber I started lurking in the UP forum for awhile before joining It was somewhat of a different forum back then more like a band of pirates giving tips on how to make more money and strategizing to beat Uber Back then Ubers AI was no where near as good as it is today and a driver had a much easier time manipulating the system to maximize revenue Now forget it Ubers AI is too good to beat except in rare circumstances

I started reading in UP about longhauling Shirlington Shuffling deliberately not intending to give a ride and creating surges Yes believe it or not you used to be able to create surges I thought I would never do any of that in a million years After dealing with Uber and pax BS boy did that change In the interest of space Ill just choose one although Ive done them all



I thought it was terrible that a driver would deliberately boost up a fare then I met Karen I took Karen on a x surge to JFK Airport in NYC from the northern suburbs At a x surge with higher rates that was a very decent fare Karen immediately became one of the most annoying pax I ever gave a ride to She was a visitor to NY from Chicago and immediately started pounding and pounding what a terrible place NY was Next she found out that I was born in Scotland and spent the next  minutes telling me how bad Scotland was and that it was one of the worse places on the face of the earth She was crass obnoxious and extremely rude The final straw was her telling me how blatantly stupid most Uber drivers were That was it OK Karen we are going to JFK by way of Long Island roflmao If you look at my route it looked like a very pregnant line FU Karen

Do you remember your first deliberate shuffle longhaul throwing a pax out etc etc Something you thought youd never do

While these numbers may appear as a childs play to some here on the forum personally I do feel satisfied with the extra  every week The best part is that I drive a car that even carmax wouldnt take it such that depreciation is removed from the equation It is such an amazing experience to be paid without having strangers in my car

clean_story:
Picked up a young lady pax south of downtown Chicago around  am and heard her talking to a guy in a hushed voice on the phone So you got what I need because I got the money She talked price on the phone and then hung up We then started talking and she said she was going deeper into the south side of Chicago to complete a deal She clutched her large purse and counted cash I thought for sure it was something else but I found out that she had human hair wigs in her purse

She said this when I asked her how she is managing the pandemic with all the uncertainty in employment for everyone This is one of my standard pax questions She said like many young pax that she was selfemployed and bought and sold hair weaves and wigs She explained that all her products come straight from Asia She said It comes from your countries China Korea and India 

She said that the best hair and prices come from the East She buys them from a secret source and then resells them This is why she feels the need to hide them from law enforcement Human hair wigs are not by themselves illegal but she felt that if law enforcement somehow discovered the source she could get into trouble sort of like having cartons of cigarettes which escaped duty US Customs tax

When I asked her if I could see one she looked behind us and around first said Well I dont see any police so here is one She showed me a few and some were weaves and some were wigs which one was dyed blond and brown They looked very nice and high quality to me The pax described her business which was booming

She said that there are smugglers of vast amounts of human hair which are often obtained illegally She said that in some Asian countries ladies have their long hair cropped off against their will sometimes in cases of religious sacrifice like when a holy leader will tell the lady that to show her love and devotion to a god then she must demonstrate a sacrificelike her long hair Which the religious leader will then sell 

I didnt really know this illegal but I guess the young lady knew that she cannot be in possession of large quantities of it This puzzled me because I know many wigs are made with real human hair and I had no idea this would be illegal She really acted like she had bags of illicit substances in her purse which was my first guess I am guessing that while a person can have maybe one of two wigs for personal use if someone has many many such hair pieces then it may not be permitted if it was determined that such products were smuggled into the US 

I suppose I found this pax ride interesting because she told me that up to  of young ladies on the south and west sides of Chicago have wigs and hair extensions I thought that young ladies just straighten their hair and then carefully take hours to weave them or braid them by hand But my pax explained that almost always you are looking at a wig not their natural hair 

Then she surprised me by pulling up her own beautiful weave to reveal a nearly bald shaved head She said her ethnicitys hair frizzes so easily especially in moisture so it is far easier to have very very short hair and then just put on a wig  weave The pax explained that she makes a very good living buying creating styling human hair from the Asian countries and there is a massive never ending market at least here in Chicago

I drove up to a strip club in Stone Park IL called The Gold Room all purple lights outside and picked up two guys and drove them into downtown Chicago this past Saturday night around  am They came in mildly drunk but were incredibly happy I remarked to them that I was surprised the strip clubs were open again because I had heard they had closed due to covid The guy behind me told me No man they reopened I was so excited that I slapped each of the girls in the as tonight thanking each of them for getting back to work

On the way to downtown one of the guys became very chatty and started talking a LOT about aliens and how he feels that they either created this world as a D simulation and we are all living in a video gameor they are behind the scenes controlling it completely by assuming key behind the scenes roles He went so far as to suggest that there are large underground military bases where the world leaders are collaborating with some alien races who wish to study humans 

I could tell that he had studied a lot into this area and he mentioned a lot of details about stories he read about famous UFOalien sightings Once in a while his friend would chime in and say that aliens must exist as there are endless worlds and universes out there He then discussed how we are all sort of living in a human ant farm like environment where everything is controlled and all variables altered to see how humans would react

When he asked me my opinion on all this I replied I can agree that there very well could be aliens but until they show up and affect my life directly I am not interested I told them that it is cool to ponder but since I cannot prove or disprove their existence right now it is not practical for me to think about it After he asked me if I had seen any I told him no He said he did see some before looking at the night sky with a telescope and he saw some when he experimented with DMT a powerful psychedelic drug 

The ride ended though in sort of a funny way About  minutes from our destination the more quiet guy sitting on my passenger side rear suddenly ask me to drive faster because he had to go to the bathroom ASAP I told him that I cannot risk getting a ticket but if it is an emergency I can pull over He said fine and then he would be OK Then with about  seconds left he screamed at me Pull over pull over now right NOW 

So I stopped quickly and he got out and then his friend who was talking about all the alien stuff went out and both relieved themselves for a long while by a building wall After they both got back in and the guy on the right said Dude that was such a relief thanks a bunch I am gonna tip you  on the app ok Anyways the ride ended and I was left entertained by those two

clean_story:
My first pax of this Sunday night was a guy I drove from Glenview IL to downtown Chicago He previously worked in the advertising business but was laid off due to covid Now he just started trying to make a living rehabbing houses and flipping them On the long ride  minutes we talked about a lot of things but mostly he complained about Uber and Lyft these days He said that he and his friends were die hard rideshare loyalists but recently he started souring on both companies

For example he said that tonight Easter Sunday he could not get a Lyft or an Uber for over an hour until I accepted the ride I drove  minutes to pick him up Before I accepted the ride he said that both Uber and Lyft told him some message like No drivers in your area try again soon or Are you sure you wish to request limited available carssomething like that He was so grateful that I finally picked him up because he was just about to give up He told me If you hadnt come then I would have had to stay overnight with my exwife so thank from the bottom of my heart for that 

He mentioned the ridiculous surge Lately he said the prices for both Uber and Lyft were equal or sometimes a lot more than what a taxi used to be And there were no more quick pickup times  minutes or less that he was used to for rideshare Now just like the taxi industry before he would often wait up to an hour as he was in the suburbs for an Uber or Lyft to showor none availablejust like the taxis

Therefore he voiced active hope that the taxi industry would get themselves back together to shape and make a valiant comeback We discussed how the Chicago medallions were a high of  back in  Now there is no bid no buyers So he hoped that now that the prices are so incredibly low there could be a chance for the left for dead taxicab companies to make a comebackand wished eagerly for them to make an effort

This got me thinking

I was actually far happier for a multitude of reasons driving a taxi part time I drove for Flash Cab and other companies than driving rideshare for two very evil companies I felt I had very more control over my destiny driving a cab Plus I paid zero attention to whether my car would depreciate not have to worry that I could be deactivated for a nonsense complaint etc etc etc etc etc

What if
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
In another thread Benjamin M talks about how few drivers seem to be out there Seems that way here in my town too Pensacola FL A lot of people have suggested reasons  and maybe some of them are valid Heres what I know

I turn the Lyft app on first because its less fussy than the stupid Uber app Take a picture of yourself Then Now take a picture with your mask on And then Now give us a urine sample It never ends Before I can even get Uber up and running the Lyft app is sending me a trip From that point on its gogogo stacked pings all day for as long as I want to drive Yes some of them are for faraway pickups and I decline as many of them as I can Many days I dont even logon to Uber

I hear from a lot of passengers that they have loooong wait times and sometimes they get a message that no cars are available Damn I had one passenger tell me how hard it was for him to get a driver to pick him up as he was enthusiastically thanking me for coming to get him I said Well it is my job dude And he goes No no One driver told me that he doesnt do passengers anymore he primarily just does food Says theres more money in it And I thought Maybe thats why the passenger apps have been so busy these days  drivers are switching to food so they dont have to deal withyou knowpeople May be Maybe if I was in this for the money Id deliver food instead too

People in general are becoming more and more dependent on rideshare to get around even in the suburbs where there are typically fewer drivers Lyft and Uber like to send you meaning me all over hell for pickups Given the option I dont accept an Uber or Lyft ping thats over  minutes away But Lyft is sneaky  theyll slide a new ride in when youve just begun the first one I keep the volume on my phone down so I dont always hear the New standard ride added to queue announcement 

I used to work six hours a day to make my target revenue Now I do it in four or five So Im kind of with Benjamin M here I kind of wish there were more drivers out in my town Its Fing busy here And my fear is that the lesssatisfied people become with rideshare the more theyll gravitate back to taxis
