In the past week I had at least three pax that told me that they are taking matters into their own hands and not going back to school or not going to college last night I picked up a pax at Dave  Busters in Rosemont Illinois and he was upset that his college experience is being ruined because of covid He is also irked because Northern Illinois University is not dramatically lowering his tuition costs Therefore he is dropping out and he is going to try to learn how to program and design video games He mentioned to me that he doesnt think school has anything like that he cannot learn on his own

Another student I picked up yesterday was a rdyear student from a city college who also was feeling that he can make a lot more money doing things on his own than what he is learning at school He felt that being an entrepreneur is far better than trying to work for a corporation in the future He told me last night that he bought three used cars at auction last night and he will fix them up and resell them He was super excited and he talked all about how much profit hed be making

There was a third guy that just graduated from New Trier high School which is a highly regarded school where a lot of rich kids go to That ride was about two nights ago and I remember he lived in Winnetka Illinois which is a very affluent suburb He was making a lot of money buying premium sneakers from online and in the north side and then he would drive to the south and the west side and sell them to inner city teenagers He described that he could buy the sneakers himself for about  and turn around some of them to some of the teenagers the inner city for  He felt that he could make it his full time job after he finishes high school in a couple of months He showed me his Instagram account where he showed off all of his shoes in his inventory

I Ieel like at least this could be the start of a trend where a lot of young college age students are feeling that the very high cost of a college education is no longer worth it and doesnt add value I feel like Ive seen a trend at least myself where young college age passengers are telling me that they plan to take matters into their own hands
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
There are a two points of view regarding postyourboast earnings threads in which people post their earnings in various levels of detail posting summaries only providing full breakdowns of individual trips or anything and everything in between Some people say that posting earnings guides to ones own market is foolish Others judging by the number of them on here think that they are great My own opinion is that they certainly are foolish However they have also benefitted me which seems contradictory Here is my experience

Late last year I was browsing this forum when I noticed a postyourboast thread Its HOPPING in my town posted the OP who went on to describe in detail the goingson in his local market He had posted a screenshot of the driver app screen of his latest weekly earnings broken down by day and also screenshots of several individual rides showing the spots that the rides originated along with the day date time and value of each one

This is interesting I thought The area advertised by the earnings boaster is a smallish community around  miles outside a major metro area in California which I knew vaguely I have friends who live very close to it whom I hadnt seen in a while plus things had been very slow in the Bay Area I had also felt like taking a little vacation So I decided to go and visit and combine a vacation with a chance to make some good money I had never driven rideshare there but my plan was simple I would just go to the spots identified by the OP on the days and times advertised by him turn on the driver app and wait

And so it happened One road trip later I went to the first staging area turned the app on and waited Things turned out to be just as the OP had said Demand was excellent and I soon bagged some great highdollar rides and a couple of very high dollar rides Over the next week I was very pleased with the results Interestingly during this time I picked up the same passenger three times from her house was a couple of miles from where I was staying indicating that there were few drivers in the area This coupled with the nice surges and excellent ping quantity was evidence of a very favourable demanddriver ratio in the area

Now back to the question posed above regarding whether postyourboast is a good idea for both the poster and for me Lets find the answer with simple costbenefit analyses If the benefits outweigh the costs then well say that it was a good result and if benefits do not outweigh the costs well say that it was not a good result

For me the costs of the exercise were gas to get to and from the posters location and the earnings I did not make in the Bay Area The benefits were the earnings I made in his area which exceeded the gas cost and my foregone home earnings by a country mile So for me it was a good result

For the OP its hard to estimate the costs of me working his area When I accepted the pings there I obviously denied those rides to all other drivers in the area Was the driver one of those drivers Was he working the area on the days and times I was Theres no way to tell All we know is that it was possible Its also possible that I was not the only driver attracted into his area by his advertising Now lets look at the other side of the analysis  the benefit side to him of advertising his area This can be summed up as zero In dollar terms  Nada As we said above if the benefits outweigh the costs then it is a positive result However with a benefit of zero the benefits of advertising ones own area on a public forum can never by defintion outweigh the cost The cost being of course the risk of losing business to competitors that one attracted into the area

In summary advertising ones area in postyourboast threads is foolish but the magnitude of the foolishness depends on the level of detail given At the top of the tree we have posting exact hotspots together with the days of the week and times to get good rides there This will result in immediate competition from other drivers turning up Further down the list of selfscuppering is the posting of daily earnings totals and the general location of the earnings While one does not divulge the exact locations and times of the opportunities it is still persuasive in attracting drivers both old and new into ones area With zero benefit for the poster boaster it is hard to see how this is a good idea As seen above there is no benefit to it for the advertiser However for the driver looking for new opportunities and areas to drive in or for existing drivers who have taken a break and are considering returning to rideshare in their town these posts can be golden eggs

Conclusion  keep posting them please Just dont do it in my area thumbup
Name: The Gift of Fish

clean_story:
This was a first for me after about  rides with Uber a passenger this past Saturday night around  am who I picked up from the city and brought for a long ride westbound began talking about how he was a Sicario hitman for the Sinaloa cartel The conversation went in this direction when we talked about what colleges we went to And we started on the topic of colleges because he had mentioned that I seemed so articulate I told him I went to the University of Chicago and he lit up with enthusiasm and we talked about economics He just said matter of factly that after college he unfortunately went to jail for several years because he shot somebody right next to his heart

I picked up  seconds of the conversation but I stopped it after he began to go into great detail and told me his name and the person that he had shot Obviously I stopped the video at that point Here is the second clip below which protects his anonymity


after he told me that he had shot somebody and gone to jail and told me to look up his name on Google I did so quickly at the next traffic light and indeed it was my passenger and I saw his mugshot He then told me about how he had been to a couple of state prisons and told me about the life inside prison Somehow he got out after several years

He befriended some people with the cartel while inside prison when he was in jail After leaving jail he said he started to work for them When I asked him why he did that because I told him it was so dangerous he said that the money is so good Also he told me that the women are so plentiful that he has no problem finding beautiful young women all the time He showed me on his phone at a couple of lights where we were stopped him posing with many beautiful women and him describing that he had been with all of them

I think he could sense that I didnt quite believe his story at first and the reason that I was a little skeptical was honestly I thought to myself that if someone is actively killing somebody why would they tell some total random stranger

Then he said I could sense that you doubt me so let me show you look And then when I turned around he produced what he said was a loaded handgun I did get scared at first but then I calmed down and then just asked him to put it away He kept on asking me if I was wearing a wire He also kept asking me if I wanted to take a bump of cocaine in the car Naturally I said no to both I told him that I would never use drugs under any circumstance and especially never while I was driving Uber

I thought if I should try to get help while I was in the ride I figured it would not be a good idea to antagonize somebody in the situation that I was in I quickly looked at the name on my app and it was not the name of my passenger So I thought to myself if something were to happen then there wouldnt be any way to necessarily track him

So I just stayed calm and listened to him tell stories of people that hes killed They were both targets in Mexico and the US He said he particularly asks for pedophiles and women beaters Tell me about the fees that he collects and theyre usually between three and  in the US The most he got was  He described that there was a code of course of no women no children however there were some unusual circumstances where things like that were allowed

then he went into some graphic detail and asked me if I ever saw somebodys head getting cut off I remember him also asking me if I ever saw several ks of cocaine live right in front of me Then he told me about the time that he saw somebody get drawn and quartered by five different cars Like they would tie each limb and the head to five different cars and then drive in different directions It went into more graphic detail about people being boiled alive and many other things I wont go into

it almost seemed like he was telling me his autobiography because he told me about names locations places hes done hitsI was extremely utterly surprised that he would go into such detail with somebody he did not know

Anyway the ride ended and like I said I stayed very very calm and collected and I didnt report it to Uber or anything else In fact he told me that the name on the account was just someone untraceable so I wouldnt even need to bother Besides he told me that I could tell someone his story but I couldnt use any personal details and I did not here He did very calmly tell me it would be a shame that someone so cool and smart like me would suddenly disappear

I wanted to share the story because it was highly unusual and it was probably the very first time while driving a passenger that I felt a little tingle of fear I did not embellish or exaggerate even a single detail of the story here

Yet another adventure in Chicago on a late Saturday night

if I suddenly stop posting on this forum without any warning you will all know what happened to me and besides I would be on the news anyway Be well everyone

clean_story:
My last pax of the night I found particularly interesting because her story was unique She had found a sugar daddy I picked her up around the Edison Park Illinois area and brought her to the DoubleTree hotel in downtown Chicago We got to talking and I asked her how the pandemic has affected her

She told me that it was pretty rough when the pandemic started because she had been working at McCormick place as one of those young women who are hired to promote displays its a business convention center and frequently they hire young ladies to cater to the businessmen who are coming in and show off whatever company theyre representing

During one of the conventions an older gentleman had befriended her and they exchanged phone numbers somehow After some communication they didnt talk for a little while Once the pandemic struck she lost all of her gigs at the convention center some of which paid her upwards of  per hour to basically stand there

Is she contacted the older gentleman and they made an agreement He would come into town and pay her visit in a hotel and they would I guess be companions for the short time he was in Chicago She actually has a young son that she must take care of so meeting him and him agreeing to be her supporter was quite fortunate for her

I asked gently her if she enjoyed his company and the entire arrangement and she seemed just okay with it Like she didnt say that she really loved him or that she hated him or anything like that For her it was just kind of a business arrangement to help her support herself and her young son Of course she didnt tell me the amount and obviously I didnt ask but she said that he sends her money every month

I thought this was interesting because during this pandemic people must cope in all sorts of different ways She was actually the first person I met who actually had a real sugar daddy she did tell me that he was happily married with children But that did not bother her because of course thats not what she wanted because he was probably around  years old I couldnt be sure but he actually came out to greet her cuz he was so excited so I got to briefly see him
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
While I have no idea how the glorious days were like when these RS companies first emerged there is no question that the rates are paltry these days With the combination of multiple rate cuts deteriorating passengers and the pandemic I have decided to quit once and for all

Recently I have been obsessed with deliveries most of which are grocery shopping At first it sounds ridiculous to me to be paid Uber rate to not only transport cargoes but also include the shopping component Contrary to my expectation this is very addicting Dont be mistaken I am not saying grocery shopping gigs are better than Ubering in any part Although the base pay is about  consider the amount of time needed to complete one delivery this is certainly not worth the effort without any incentives What I mean by incentives are in nature not the useless badges and ratings

First I love the upfront information about expected pay time to completion and pickup and dropoff locations all of which we are supposed to be entitled to not to be provided only if certain outrageous criteria are met Here comes the best part the monetary incentives Depending on the local markets and time the estimated payout with bonus included can be far more attractive than doing rides not to mention you will have full control of where to end up after a delivery Needless to say how much we take home is also highly dependent on the willingness of customers to tip However if you are the type that withdraw every penny after each delivery this may not work for you because there is a  cap Personally I have no problem for these companies to keep the money for a year if there is a minimum of  interest rate 




Finally I am also astonished by the real time support For instance a transaction will be denied by default when customers request additional items after we accept an order It only takes a minute or two for the support to override the payment authorization They are also very helpful to assign a return for unsuccessful deliveries Since not every store accepts return because of the pandemic basically I have free food plus the  to drive back to the store The only time that happened to me also include some adult products Um may be I should consider selling them

clean_story:
I had a pickup in Mount prospect Illinois with a pax named Margaret who was going to a bar in Schaumburg Illinois Hers was a fascinating story about how covid changed her life and completely turned everything around

She works currently for Comcast and is a technical support agent She said that when the pandemic struck last year they offered everyone who worked a  bonus in their hourly salary Then because of the pandemic she was promoted finally to being a manager with a big salary raise in addition to the  bump

Then all the sudden she said she felt like she hit the jackpot because Comcast said that everyone could work remotely She said that was such a relief because she said that initially her office was in Schaumburg then they moved her to oakbrook and then finally to Bolingbrook Illinois Her commute times went from  minutes to  minutes to  hour when she finally got located to Bolingbrook Illinois The commute was killing her because sometimes when there was traffic it would be an hour and a half back home

she loved being able to just work from her pajamas because she doesnt even have to be seen since shes a technical support agent Then recently she said that they introduced at Comcast a text support feature that means she doesnt even have to be on the phone anymore with a headset She said that was a godsend because she was sick and tired of having to continue to talk to customers who would ramble on and on She didnt have to talk over them anymore 

She said she could also listen to music which she said was a first while she was working She would just blast music and then shed be on video with friends just hanging out Sometimes she would just go to friends homes and even restaurants and just do her work from there

She also said that she had just recently bought a brand new car because her old one broke down But because of the pandemic she said that she was able to sell her car to her friend who gave her a very good price so now she no longer has a car payment or has to pay for any insurance and just takes Uber when she needs to go somewhere but she says its not often

She said with all the promotions in the bump up and pay and the incredibly relaxing work and being able to sell her car that her finances completely turned around She told me that shes saving up so much money for extended vacations to Italy and France and all around the world she said she could never save money before the pandemic She just yesterday got her third stimulus bonus by direct deposit as well

She admitted that she feels terrible about this because shes knows a lot of people have gotten sick and died and she feels guilty about admitting to anybody how she feels but she admitted to me that shes had a hard life and after years and years of difficult times the universe finally rewarded her personally with the pandemic She said her life was now better than ever Better than its ever been in her entire life Ive had a lot of pandemic stories that were somewhat positive in the last year but this one blew all the others out of the water
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
Uber recently lost its challenge in the UK courts to have its drivers classified as independent contractors In a nutshell the UK Supreme Court judged Ubers claims that it is merely a software platform that links pax and drivers to be nonsense and that its drivers are indeed employees Ubers reaction to making its UK drivers employees



And



So in the UK Dara and Co accept that the UK ruling that its drivers are employees is a clearer path forward in giving its workers rights and that it is willing to change its ways

However in California the company sings along to a completely different tune Voters decided in the Prop  election that Ubers drivers are not employees but independent contractors Ubers reaction



And



In California Uber praises voters for deciding the polar opposite of the UK and that decision to  class its drivers as employees is the best for the drivers

Doublespeak much We as drivers have known for a long time that Uber has its bullshit generator running  However up until now the bullshit had largely been consistent Now Uber demonstrates that it will say whatever it thinks will benefit it the most adapting the rhetoric at will to whatever situation it finds itself in regardless of any contradictions with previously published positions

Such duplicity would worry me greatly as an investor particularly with reference to Daras claims surrounding promised future profitability However with Ubers stock price still on an upward trend none of this seems to worry the market Go figure

Sources
Name: The Gift of Fish

They continued to yell similar racial and other hateful comments as I drove no one will ever suck your Dxxx you ugly gay  I remained silent and got them to their destination Fortunately they got out while still threating to kill me 

The ADT safety rep was wonderful She was kind and recognized that I was in shock She offered assistance and stayed with me until I could breathe again 

Lyft They sent me an email asking me to call them When I did they said they were too busy and to send them an email 

Oh and while I was on the phone with ADT emergency support they assigned me a new pick up Im a  star drive so I pulled it together and drove there The passenger didnt show up After waiting ten minutes and calling and texting six times I cancelled I received a message that I needed to drive close even though I was a foot from the front door Im still trying to get my cancellation fee Fortunately I took a phot of me right under the address and at the front door 

Meanwhile there is a disturbed passenger out there willing to make multiple threats to kill a Lyft driver  and Lyft could care less 

Be safe out there 

worstnightever
Name: dtwguy

My first riders last night were around  pm it was kind of a tiger mom in an upscale neighborhood in Illinois called park ridge The mom was with her daughter who was in high school Definitely had to be main south high school because thats the area we were in its definitely full of rich people and thats where Hillary Clinton went to high school

The daughter was explaining to the mom that there was no hybrid options anymore but it was all in person or remote only for classes I overheard the daughter explaining to the mom that she wanted to see her friends and be in person

clean_story: Ok so if you are creepy or look like Shrek mixed with Seth Rogen this probably wont work but when I used to drive Lyft back in my early s I had luck with this little trick I would whip out bumble or tender whenever someone hot pinged me Id get the date app pulled up and start swiping as the passenger was walking up Theyd get in and see i would have bumble and then mention something like omg your on bumble too and BAM youve got them thinking about dating and the conversation started Id follow it up with something like Im new at this I just downloaded the app and thought Id give it a try Im not too sure how it works This was like chum in the water Play innocent she might ask to switch upfront and wanna look at your phone to see your profile and your face up close Keep some fire matches in your bumble deck so when she looks at your phone she notices youve got hot woman youve already matched with this will bring out her competitive spirit and make her just a bit insecure and jealous Trust me youll actually appear more attractive ProTip Also Have a GOOD profile picture Men I cannot emphasize this enough Be sure you have a nice headshot no double chin taken from the front seat of your car Get in good lighting put a nice shirt on wash your face and comb your hair and use your portrait mode selfie in good lighting then upload it to Lyft Accentuate that jaw Ok now back to my advice Shes chatting with you now This will lead into  of  avenues  shes taken or uninterested in that case she will usually give you tips on your profile and you can max out your bumble game or  shes single and yall hit it off and you get her number Just a little tip that seemed to work

clean_story:
I picked up a pax in Chicago and as we talked he said to me You seem like a very knowledgeable guy could you please give me advice on what to do with my girlfriend We are having issues His real name I remember was Lorenzo I dont see an issue with saying his real name because he did not disclose anything illicit or extremely personalit is just sort of an innocent story I replied OK Ill try to do my best He said Well my girlfriend said we should try to stop something we are doing and be more responsible I wondered if it was something bad like drugs or gambling or overspending 

He went on to say that his girlfriend is starting to feel guilty about how they are sexually active Lorenzo said that he wanted to get married to her soon and she expressed that she felt the same about him The issue was that she felt if they are planning to get married she should not be sexually active prior to marriage She said that there was a thing about revirginizing oneself He said he was frustrated that he would have to wait for sexual fulfillment He said he was  years old and his girlfriend was  

At least to me he was very gentle sort of shy and the sort of person that could not hurt a fly I remarked to him about this how gentle and kind he seemed and he said that has always been his personality I asked him about his girlfriend advising him not to get too personal and he said his girlfriend was the same I then asked if religion had anything to do with his girlfriend wanting to revirginize herself I pondered if she was Muslim where premarital sex is particularly frowned upon 

He told him that both he and his girlfriend were Christian I then asked him Do you want to marry her then Do you see a forever long term relationship with her Without hesitation he said that he does and that there is no other for him So then I advised him Well then bro the answer is obvious get married right away dont wait If you know she is the one and she is going to withhold sex from you now then just get married immediately

He replied that the issue was his family was very very large and that both of them talked about it and how having a wedding during this pandemic would be exceedingly difficult So they felt they needed to wait

I then suggested a solution that he got really happy to hear I told him that a few of my younger cousins secretly got married this year just in court without telling anyone in the family They did so for many reasons and they did not want to say just invite a few people in the family and have others feel left out But they immediately told everyone in the family through a group email that they plan to have the BIG family wedding AFTER the pandemic restrictions lift and then everyone will feel included

This solution seemed to surprise Lorenzo and he said Omg why didnt I think of that before He thanked me profusely and seemed incredibly happy Then he said that he would propose the idea to his girlfriend right away After he left I could tell that at least he was sincere because he left a  tip on a rather short ride Sometimes we ants have to play therapist In this case I found a solution that the pax really appreciated 

Question for my fellow antshave you also had a situation where you found a keen solution to a relationship issue that the pax latched onto

The next day I asked some female friends that I have if revirginizing is a thing before marriageand I found that many of them agreed with Lorenzos girlfriend that many women do this to buttress their feelings of innocence and integrity as a lady I suppose that I learn every day I heard of this but I really did not know how prevalent such a thing really was
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
This was a firstnot just one but two of my pax fell flat onto the pavement as they exited my Uber I picked up around  am three pax at a bar called Drink in Schaumburg IL as the bar was closing All three got into my car just fine so I accepted them into my car I of course would have thought of cancelling if they stumbled towards my car but all three walked just fine

But after they got into the car I knew at least two were completely smash drunk The girlfriend of one of the pax slumped over onto her boyfriends shoulder almost immediately and passed out Jose the pax who ordered was sitting behind me slurring his speech profoundly The boyfriend of the girl seemed OK and spoke to me and Jose As we drove the boyfriend spoke to Jose and they discussed how awesome the night was and Jose remarked about how utterly completely smash drunk he was and how he vomited in the bathroom many times

I could tell this was the case as there was a stench of vomit as he spoke I think other ants could attest to this you know the smell The boyfriend then told me that they do this a lot go out and get completely smash drunk Jose then told me and the boyfriend of the girl who has passed out how much he enjoyed the night

I wondered about this why people do this I got drunk oncebut just  The experience was so physically uncomfortable and I hated the feeling of a loss of control It would be like if I was driving a car and the steering wheel got a ton of play in it and the brakes were sluggish and the accelerator did not respond etc Can anyone comment as to why people do this I can not fathom how someone would regularly subject themselves to experiencing profound bodily sickness and a psychological loss of control

Anyhow when we got to the destination all three got out but the girlfriend was so disoriented Suddenly as she was walking she collapsed onto the pavementhard I was shocked and got out and I saw that Jose and the boyfriend lifted her and she seemed OK and smiled in an embarrassed way at me I asked if she was OK and all three assured me that she was The two guys put her arms on their shoulder and walked a few steps towards their apartment complex Butsuddenly both Jose AND the girlfriend collapsed onto the pavement Not slowly falling down and putting their outstretched hands downbut just fell flat very fast and hard I was alarmed and asked the boyfriend if they needed an ambulance But he said no I cautiously watched them to observe them for a few minutes They got up and all three went in shoulder to shoulder and sort of did a dance swaying side to side moving as one bodyuntil they disappeared right in the hallway

I am writing about this because I have documented before on UPnet some very alarming instances of brutal intoxication Can anyone hazard a guess as to why some pax do this on a routine basis It appears to me some type of mental issue or masochism Maybe once I can understand never to be repeated but to get smash drunk many times a month year after year and be pleased with the experience

At least they were taking an Uber home
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
First trip last night in Chicago was some guy named Brian who told me that he had just finished a marathon run on playing Magic the Gathering with many friends hours of it He and his friends were overjoyed because they were all celebrating as a result of the massive stimulus being passed He was a laid off worker from an advertising company in Chicago named Leo Burnett 

We talked about his group of friends who he was playing the games with and one of them was a laid off airline engine mechanic at OHare airport I cant now remember the airline Anyway he said that his friend was asked back by the airline to start work again He told me his friend refused because of the extended unemployment until September his friend said that even though theres little chance of getting covid at his job because he is an airline mechanic he is entitled to a very long paid vacation after putting in so much time with the airline His other friends also felt the same way I browse through other websites on my downtime Majority of laid off workers with the extended unemployment PUA all feel that they deserve this gravy train 

I hope that finally when they have to go back to work theyre prepared to do so and keep their job skills uptodate as for the airline mechanic Im afraid that his job might not be waiting for him when hes finally ready to return his job is not like driving for Uber where you can just log on and start taking rides
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
Weekends are when I get my best stories and I thought this one was interesting I picked up a pax named William near the Merchandise Mart train station in downtown Chicago and we got to discussing the pandemic and how he was dealing with it He shared with me that just over a year ago he was let go from the most fun job he ever had He was working for Yelp the company who does the online reviews for restaurants and local businesses He said that it was by far the most fun he ever had and he was making great money

William said that the top salesman for the downtown Chicago office made over  in commission in a month before the pandemic crushed business He said he was one of the top salesman and made six figures Andhe loved the environment He told me about how there was prepandemic nearly  people in the Yelp downtown office and after you go through security it was a job workplace heaven He gave the funny analogy that the pit where everyone was selling was like in the movie Wolf of Wall Street and how when someone got a big sale everyone would know because some horn would go off and everyone would go over and congratulate the salesman He mentioned though there was no drugs or dwarfs thrown

The pax told me that there were ping pong tables other amenities like board games and lounge chairs to be used during break and FREE BEER and FREE FOOD And he said it was very good food all you can eat I was surprised because I thought that only like Amazon Facebook and Google had this type of workplace amenities I didnt know Yelp had that kind of money

William told me that the company really cared about making employees happy He said that as the pandemic crushed business Yelp tried hard to keep as many people onboard and on payroll He said that he started working remotely from home but it was totally soul crushing After all restaurants and businesses closed down and trying to get new clients was darn near impossible he said

He said Yelp paid some bonuses and tried and triedbut in the end it was not enough and he and most everyone was let go He said there is still a shell left of his team in the downtown Chicago office and he has no ill will towards his former company because they tried so hard to survive but the Chicago location collapsed anyhow After a few months on UI he found a job with FedEx as a driver and he was being dropped off in the Niles IL location by Touhy ave and Niles Center road He seemed happy enough as a FedEx employee and we both discussed that business was BOOMING for FedEx and his job is likely secure as an ironclad chain

But wistfully he lamented the loss of the best job he said he ever had in his life
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
On Saturday night at  am I had a pickup in Skokie IL a north suburb by AMC Theaters also near Red Robin and Buffalo Wild Wings I swiped right and saw the three young men entering my Uber were going to the Hyatt Place in Rosemont IL about a  minute ride Immediately I noticed they were drunk but even more vexingvery loud They began to ask me many questions about everything I answered abruptly with monosyllables They were loud ugh Then one of them got on their phone and put it on speaker and called some girl Then they all proceeded to have a group discussion of their night also asking me questions to try to involve me in their drunken talk 

It was the end of a long Saturday night which are always very taxing for an Uber ant Especially now during the pandemic it has gotten so very much worse So I was not in a mood to feign interest with  very loud annoying pax who was discussing their hard partying with some girl they all knew I could hear them talk stuff like Yeah when we sat down on the table and that other group approached I was pissed Dont you think that the promoter will be interested in holding that party for next weekendstuff like that

So I put on my Sony almost noise cancelling headphones with very snug earbuds and turned on some peaceful classical music at a loud volume I told them that I need to listen to the Uber navigation system to insure that I drive to their destination properly so I may not be able to communicate with them Suddenly as the soft notes of the symphony emerged the three annoying pax almost seemed to magically disappear from my car I could hear them still trying to talk to me gesturing at me and one even tapped my shoulder trying to get my attention

I did remove one earbud and asked Is there a problem and he answered No I just wanna ask you howthis and that I interrupted with So sorry but I need to hear the Uber navigation It is very important And then put back on my classical music 

Soooo nice It was suddenly like I was in another world of peace and harmony

I think they got the message because at the end of the ride they just got out without saying a word and I did not say goodnight either I recommend everyone get a pair of very snug blutooth headphones preferably noise cancelling which will drown out annoying pax I am doing this more and more now with great results

The only issue of course is that you wont be able to hear other traffic like someone honking their horn And most importantly you must redouble your sight for any emergency vehicles since you wont be able to hear sirens ButI think that at least for me it is totally worth it When an annoying pax is about to test my patience some Mozart Beethoven or Handel will help me immensely

For myself I care nothing at all about getting a one star review from the pax if they feel I am ignoring them If they are loud and obnoxious I put them on ignore with great satisfaction and relief
Name: Young Kim

Saturday night February th was a very unique evening in the sense that I nearly hit one pedestrian and had to brake rather hard for another but I saw the latter coming easily Also I very regrettably sent a bunny into rabbit heaven It was strange because I do sometimes have to narrowly avoid clueless pedestrians but this all happened within a short span of time in one night The first was the most jarring because I nearly without exaggeration came very close to striking a pax darting out from between two cars into another Uber I do just wish to point out that I was not speeding at all and rather driving about  miles under the speed limit 

I was driving southbound on Linder Ave approaching Lawrence Ave in the north side of Chicago and on a narrow street when a would be pax literally jumped out from between two cars and ran in front of my car to their Uber across the street I hit the brake and gasped at how close I came to hitting himher After stopping I saw the other Uber ants face who was parked look at me and we both shook our heads in disbelief His pax in a white parka jacket with fur on the hoodie so I could not see the face jumped into the Uber completely not even acknowledging that heshe I could not tell almost got seriously injured The street was  mph so if I did not brake hard I doubt the pax would have had life threatening injuries but heshe would have been gravely hurt

How many of you have had a person sprint in front of your vehicle running for their own Uber

Next I was driving west on Harrison Street by Halsted next to the UIC campusk a short while later and I saw a bunny suddenly jump into the street in a hurry I slammed on the brakes I was doing an UberEats order so there was no pax in my car and veered right fast As the car decelerated quickly I thought I cleared the bunny easilybutit jumped back right into my path under my tires in the last split second

Squirrels very common I have avoided easily because they move in a predictable trajectory and at constant velocity and zero acceleration Deer are easy to avoid because they are large and move slowly Geese or birds are even easier because they move either very very slowly or just fly away But this bunny was moving and darting all over the place As it jumped into my path it hopped like up left down and then finally back to my rightjust as I thought I missed it I heard a thud I felt awful and disgusted then hoped that it was not the bunny

I slowly backed up away left from centerbut I saw the heap of rabbit lying in the road I am not sure why that bothered me so much but I felt really awful But not guilty Because I knew that I did everything I could to avoid that bunny Plus I was as I always am paying close attention to animals And I was not speeding at all It was the very first time in my life I hit a bunny and noted that I could not have predicted its movement as it seemed in retrospect completely random and unpredictable Its last jump was right into my tire pathssigh

And so surprisingly because it happened again shortly later my next pax pickup was further south in the south side of Chicago by Roosevelt Ave and Racine Ave a rather faster moving bigger street  mph I saw a man just run across the street in front of my car However I saw him running from the sidewalk easily as his path was not obscured by cars like the first pedestrian I mentioned who appeared suddenly in between two parked cars I ended up braking hard though and he slowly just walked in front of my car as I came to a complete stop I was a bit unhappy that some people just run into the street even on a busy street without looking at ALL 

I am certain that all Uber ants have come close to hitting clueless pedestrians and likely causing roadkill of animals through no fault of their own But have any of you actually HIT a pedestrian Please do share your story of near misses
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
OK just when I thought this job cannot get any worse it did tonight a couple of hours ago I would like to ask at the end if anyone has had a most frustrating pax than the one I just had The pax was a long pickup in Des Plaines IL The name on the app was Jordan this is in the northwest suburbs of Chicago IL in a middle class suburb Pax came out of a nice apartment complex The pax comes out and everything starts off OK But then he asks me Do you have an aux cord Warning to newbies never ever offer an aux cord if asked pax will demand you play their music at full blast on repeat the entire ride I said no of course Then he asks if he can Blutooth his phone to my car speaker system I replied of course No sir my blutooth system does not work

Jordan tells me that he wishes to have me listen to his and his friend Kuta Magnificents recent hip hop song which he argued would be the single top most downloaded song on Spotify predicting at least a BILLION downloads I said so sorry Jordan but my blutooth system does not work but if you tell me the song Ill look it up after I get home tonight OK Jordan just gets his phone out and starts playing his and his friends song  but the song title was  thats right that  was the name of the song

I could not believe the garbage that came out of his phone Mind you I enjoy all music including hiphop and rap music But his song In the Shit was  minutes of a guy singing He is in the shit Bweetch you all know the actual word is in the shit My boy is in the shit the Nword is in the shit My homie is in the shit interspersed with all manner of profanity and vulgar language describing criminal behavior like shooting drugs defaming women committing crimes etc I heard the song  times in the  minute ride I had to bear hearing some guy rapping the words  probably more than two hundred times I tried to be polite but I could feel my remaining feelings of positivity towards pax being wiped away like a vestigial organ or decaying body part

He asked me to be friends on Facebook and Instagram over and over I replied Sorry Uber community guidelines prohibit such communication Then at the end of the ride he asked me AGAIN if I could look him up on Instagram and download and listen AGAIN to his fabulous song In the Shit and tell all my friends about it He said he and his friend Kuta Magnificent would become big as big as Drake Lil Wayne JayZ and The Weeknd Now I really enjoy much of the work of the previous artists But his song In the Shit was literally the worst piece of hiphop I have ever heard

I already had a stacked order right behind this ride and so I told Jordan that I cannot stop and look up and download his song In the Shit I showed him on my app the green dot after his ride proving that I indeed had another rider who had been waiting a very long time I told him that the next rider is already waiting  minutes and therefore I could not take any more time since the ride was over At the end of the ride when we reached the destination I swiped right and asked very politely if he would exit the vehicle since the next rider had been waiting

Then he got upset and really bizarre

Jordan said his real name was Kuta Amazing not Jordan so I really dont know his real name now He kept insistingthen  that I look up and download his song and spread the incredible work of art of his and his friends to my friends and my social media connections When I said I cannot right then but I will do so after my shift was over he started calling me a dumb Asian boy over and overlike  times He said I was missing out on letting others know how great his song In the Shit was

I steadfastly insisted that he exit my vehicle he just refused over and overand just sat there He argued that the next passenger does not have a song as great as his so I would be justified in making the next passenger wait I replied that it is unlikely that the next pax is even a hiphop singer Also I tried to explain to him that it was very inconsiderate to make someone wait for such an endeavor

Then he got quiet and I started to feel a bit nervous Maybe  seconds passed of silence and I contemplated calling for help through the Uber app or  But this was a moment to try to prevent any escalation I was in a safe middle class neighborhood in Illinois after all And he was not being immediately threatening Rather he was simply refusing to exit the vehicle and seemed insulted that I would not download his song then and there

I tried to say encouraging things positive things to make him feel better and have him exit the vehicle Finally a car approached from behind us and I told him that I must insist that he exit the vehicle immediately As I drove forward to allow the car behind me to pass he  opened the car door put his feet out as his legs dragged across the cement and yelled Bweetch why are you moving the fing car I immediately thought to myself WHY ARE YOU OPENING THE CAR DOOR AND TRYING TO STEP OUT WHILE THE VEHICLE IS MOVING I was stunnedhe could have seriously injured himself

I stopped fast to avoid him being dragged under my wheels When the car stopped he finally got out Never was I more happy that a ride had ended Strangely he waved bye to me and smiled

Since the pandemic began this job has gotten more and more challenging as the months have passed I have driven without interruption all months of the past year To those of you sitting this out during the pandemic it is likely a very wise decision I think my sanity is slowly withering away I think I may start posting like  or maybe far far worse soon if this constant march of negativity does not destroy the final fragments of love and faith I have left for humanity As I drove off I literally thought I was dreaminghaving a terrible nightmare Like I really could not believe I had such a crazy passenger I reflect now that maybe he was high on Crystal Meth or Crack Cocaine

Below I will upload a one minute video YouTube link of Jordan or maybe his name is actually Kuta Amazing at the end of the ride as he refused to exit my vehicle You can hear at least one instance of him calling me  he called me that at least  times at the end of the trip just because I refused to sit and download onto my phone his magnum opus In the Shit I can see that upon listening to the audio that I am talking rather fast normally I do not But I was very agitated on trying to have him exit my vehicle ASAP Also I did not take video footage of his face


At this point I am sure everyone knows that I really try my best to be as patient compassionate and caring as a person should while driving Uber But after this ride I can see how people can lose their sanity I am hoping  does not have to read a post of mine in the future where I demonstrate an unbridled hatred of humans I cannot allow myself to go there

Finally I wish to state unequivocally that I was NOT exaggerating the utter sheer insanity of this pax and the aspects of this ridethis all really happened Before anyone questions why I did not yell and scream at the passenger to Get the F out of my car you had to see him and how bizarre he was acting at the end I thought it best to not agitate him
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
I got a call from Uber Support that one of my previous PAX said he left his wallet in my car and asked me to call the PAX or text support back

I checked my car no wallet Texted support back saying no wallet in my car sorry Well Uber support was nice enough to give the PAX my phone number Get a call and it says SPAM Risk okay I love messing with these people I answer It is my PAX that says her husband left a wallet I tell her I replied to Uber they should have forwarded the reply to her She said they did but she knows the wallet is in my car and she wants it back

With that attitude I said I checked its not here sorry Good Bye and hung up She tried calling me back  more times I get a call from another number I dont answer They leave a message It is the husband he tells me he knows the wallet was in his right hand when he got in my car he got in the driver side rear door and he put the wallet in the middle of the seat to answer his phone and forgot to grab the wallet when he got out

I text back that there was no wallet in my car or if he did leave it one of my next PAX must have seen and took it 

 minutes later I get a   rating pop up Oh well dont really care about the rating This morning I realize his story was detailed enough that it should show in my dash cam You can clearly see him walking up to my car with empty hands You can see him get in the car and his right hand is clearly empty You can see him answer his phone and never have a wallet or put it down

I texted him back this morning saying I reviewed my dashcam files and he did not have a wallet in his hand when we walked up to my car and when he got in my car he clearly did not have any thing in his right hand Thanks for the   rating and no tip

He never replied back

clean_story:
All these long hours trying in vain to keep positive are weighing me down and I can sense darker feelings coming over me Around  am I had a pickup at a bar in the northwest suburbs of Chicago in Arlington Heights After the pax made me wait I remember her name was Patricia for  minutes I saw her come out in a group of  I rolled down my window and said Sorry but there is too many people 

She was clearly drunk and her face was red She just stared with glassy eyes for a short while silently and then said Well can you still take me and my friends home 

I said Sorry too many people I have a cooler and a bunch of stuff in my front passenger seat

She replied Cant you move the stuff to the trunk Ill tip you

I replied to her that I could even though it is against Uber policy but it may be easier for her to order a second Uber

At this point she acted all entitled and she said angrily What is wrong with you Are you OK Are you OK to take us home

I felt something in me snap I thought to myself obviously why the heck would I not be OK it is you that is not OK because you are an angry drunk

I abruptly said to her Hey Im cancelling this ride I did nothing wrong here and suddenly you are being rude to me I dont take rude customers She just stared at me in shock and disbelief but then I think it dawned on her that she made a mistake 

I felt such a joy cancelling on her She did not think this through Tonight the wait times especially in the suburbs were LONG Like  minutes long Andpeople were telling me that Ubers were cancelling on them And the bar she was at with her friends was closing And some pax were telling me that they saw the dreaded Sorry no UberXs in your area pls try again later in the northwest suburbs where I was driving She may have to wait for  minutes or longer and would have to beg the bar to let her and her friends stay inside until another Uber shows up

Drunk entitled pax often act in a manner that is completely illogical and detrimental She probably thought in her drunken state that she could be rude and order the Uber drivers to do whatever she wanted 

Big mistake this was not preCovd in the middle of downtown Chicago Her friends who were sober knew instantly the mistake Patricia made and apologized and asked if I would bring them anyway 

I said No I knew also that once the ride started she would complain and give me crap the entire ride and obviously one star me which I dont care about but I didnt want to deal with an angry drunk pax INSIDE my car I found that if the pax before the ride even starts sniffs of a problem it is better to cut your losses and get out of there

clean_story:
This was an interesting ride in the sense that it echoes more or more of what I am experiencing with pax I picked up a couple of young men in the southwest suburbs of Chicago Western Springs and brought them all the way up to the north side of Chicago In this long ride I had a lot of time to talk to them Both were out of school now and wanted to become YouTube TikTok Instagram stars They wanted to make it as recording artistsacross social media They told me that they do livestream feeds where people tune into their work and as I understood it they mix music like hiphop

Where it became more interesting to me was that they gave up looking for a stable job because the price of Bitcoin was soaring so much that they felt they will never have to work a real job again for the rest of their lives I did check after the ride ended and I just saw it hit around  per Bitcoin I feel like the pandemic low last year was around  They kept telling me that I should invest heavily in it they spoke of it almost as if it was a new religion They were talking one million dollars per Bitcoinand stuff like that

I heard that Uber may accept Bitcoin as paymentor some rumors of that

I wished them well and for their sake I hope that they achieve their dreams But I wondered to myself if this is the right attitude Can a plethora of young college agecollege graduates decide and become successful cryptocurrency investors and not have to work any real jobs 

I am not sure if such an attitude is best I do own some Bitcoin actually and I dont recommend it or not recommend it herebut I wanted to share an interesting story about how many young people are banking on the price of it to allow them never to do  again I am not so sure if that is a good plan Even if it works our economy will still need people to work right
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
Nice  something woman working for a major international chain that is quite a popular midlevel restaurantbar setup in our market

We hit it off at the start of the  minute ride and it turns out she was in charge of take out and deliveries at this large place on the VD weekend Decided to interview her on the sly for some UP contentheh

They turned off all internet delivery apps after the first  hours around  PM because they were getting slammed on all fronts DD UE and STD and could not handle it Mainy the apps though were causing the trouble Too many people ordering and no kitchen can keep up too many customers complaining losing  in fees and having things sit an hour plus for pickups was the reason As these are the least profitable orders by far they got whacked

Next was pick ups for take out from their own website which were averaging about  orders every  minutes for about  hours straight They track this metric in  minute segments apparently and promote it with discounts and a points program for members

They also had a  minute line to be seated until close as they were not doing reservations Covid here means you can only seat  capacity so they were being ruthless and doing first come first serve with a  min max seating time Cant say I blame them

clean_story:
It started off fine I picked up  pax at a bar in a suburb south of the city around  am It was a couple The guy suddenly started asking me if I was Korean I replied Yes sir I am He proceeded to ask me  times exactly if I was Korean on a  minute ride Each time I would answer Yes After around the th time I started counting it back to him Yes I am Korean that is for the nd timeYes I am Korean for the rd timeYes I am Korean for the th time etc At this point I went from being annoyed to very amused

The girlfriend who was very cute started to apologize profusely and kept telling her boyfriend to shut up She was quite friendly and tried to divert the repeated questions to other topics She asked me if I thought she was fit and cute showed me her stomach to which I replied Of coursehavent you seen a mirror recently

Then the boyfriend suddenly started asking me  are you Korean over and over

I calmly replied that both my parents are Korean so my genetics followed from that biological fact He in his drunken state started to repeat that same question over and over afraid to get to the th time for that question I cut him off I then answered by having a short talk about how there are  chromosomes in each cell of my body consisting of  pairs and two sex chromosomesinheritance patterns etc And all this explains why my being Korean has a logical connection to my parents being Korean

For my own amusement I quickly pointed out how traits are inherited from each parent through DNA transmission according to Mendelian genetics and again tried to explain that is the reason I am in fact Korean and not another race

After a long silent pause he again askedSowhy are you Korean

I tried so hard not to laugh

At the end of the ride the girlfriend apologized again for her boyfriend and then handed me a twenty The boyfriend gets out and is suddenly very friendly with me and asked his girlfriend if she had tipped me well She replied that she did and both disappeared into their apartment building

I thought this ride which started out sort of annoying ended up very amusing and funny The  dollar tip at the end was very nice
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
I have mixed feeling about pax the same as I would about any John and Jane Doe with whom Id have to interact with out there I guess

But there is one variety of pax who I appreciate more than mostits the pax who unknowingly aids and abets me to weed out their low payingpotentially problematic rides by outing themselves with messages which reveal the true colors of what might transpire if I dare PU at their pin drop

Upon receipt of such messages I quickly cancel then recast my net for higher paying rideslower drama rides saving me the hassle of having to haul it  mins down the road only to see a nonsensical ride that I cant work with

This is a thank you to them because they keep my economic fly wheel turning without having to break my vibe or mess up my bottom line

The pax who sends these revealing message is indeed a special onebecause unlike their stealthier counterparts who KNOW what theytheir rides are so mask their true location andor identity or continually launch new accounts to woo drivers back into their den they volunteerily tip their hand to show me the kinda of ride most likely to suck time money and energy out of my hustle possibility ending my hustle on a sour note

These message are super helpful in my market where UL dont show pax destination until you accept all the  min away rides and score a  AR or something like which I DONT haveone can sniff out rides which dont make financial sense by simply reading and understanding these pax messages

Here are a few of my choice favorites with interpretations

Pax message We are at the Circle K and its am just scored and need a mule bruh

Pax message I have a lot of groceries so can you load our  carts full drive  miles park your nice new car in section  housing after dark and leave it unattended to run my stuff up  flights of stairs for  andooh dont worry because Ill take care of you on the app

The best one is

Pax message You are picking my son up from middle school school thus violating your ToS on a ride which is not only awkward but not completely legal and can result in legal action

By the waythis message is a good one to screen shot and then dash to UL inviting them to discuss ToS with pax

Are there any pax messages you all get which prompt a quick cancellation
Name: #1husler

clean_story:
Yes Juan in your red Toyota Sienna I would like to thank you for demanding a  upfront cash tip from your passenger last night around  PM 

Okay I know chances are real slim that Juan will ever read this

Yesterday around  PM I get a ping for a trip  miles south estimated to be  minutes long I pull up and there are  ladies mom and and two teens estimated in the  year old range I verify identity and they all pile in the back seat I know this trip is going to an area that is farther away from my house and chances of getting a ride back to my area will be slim but oh well

Mom immediately gets on the phone and says we are in a second Uber and should be there in less than an hour My mind starts to wonder Several minutes later Mom gets on the phone again and I hear here say ride issue okay she is on the phone with Uber support After some frustration she gets connected to a person

Basically Juan in a red Toyota Sienna came to pick them up After they were in the car he started the trip and saw where they are going Guessing Juan does not have Uber Pro Status She said Juan proceeded to demand a  cash tip up front because he would have to drive back  miles with no pay She refused Juan kicked them out and drove off

She was going off on the Uber rep on the phone she also had to repeat twice to the rep No not Paul I am in his car now and we are heading to our hotel it was Juan that was the problem

Juan demanded  kicked out his PAX and his PAX rewarded me with a nice crisp  bill upon arrival to their resort She thanked me for a nice safe professional ride

On a side note I did several trips in that area while I was there and also my final trip in that area took me  miles back toward my house Well worth the slight inconvenience of going  miles away from home

This is the last window youd ever think would be broken by a road hazard but it actually happened

A pickup truck passed me at high speed on the right which kicked up a rock and then CRACK  Took me  seconds to realize it was this window which was taken out because  of them seem to hit your windshield and nothing moreright  Kept staring at my windscreen looking for the damage but saw nothing corresponding to the sound of the impact until I checked my mirrors and saw this

Dealer list price because no used parts were available anywhere was  CAD plus taxesthey cut me  off so I paid  CAD plus tax FWIW an entire new front aftermarket windshield is a mere  CAD plus tax installed Go figureheh

Its only like a half an hour of tech time though to replace it Pop of the inner plastic window trim undo two small bolts pop the entire assembly out it comes as the glass and frame with mouldings attached put the new part in then reassemble it

clean_story:
Its been a while since I have been here I just wanted to share a bit of success I have had and perhaps inspire someone who has been on the fence about taking the leap In september I officially did my last Uber ride and although it had many ups downs Im thankful for Uber because at a time of need when I need some extra income I was able to just do that Uber is a terrible company to work for and after a while it does wear on you and I truly lasted as long as I could after working a regular  I would put in  to  hours a week on Uber and did this for almost  years September of  I finally had enough I was working  days a week some days  hours a day between both jobs and I just needed a break
In December i decided to give the stock market I try my first month was a complete bust I lost about  of my original  investment and completely took out all my investments However after doing a lot more research and some studying and following the market I decided to give it another run Since January st I have more than tripled my portfolio with a lot of success some failure a lot of learning and much more learning left to do This is definitely not for everyone but if you have an analytical brain and some good sense there is money to be made in the market No I dont have a channel I dont post what I buy or am I trying to get people to subscribe to anything However if you have any inclination do your research and maybe start with a paper account there is money to be made

clean_story:
I was doing some driving tonight making pretty decent money when at about PM I got a phone call Normally I have my calls screened so that if the number is not in my contact list it goes straight to voice mail but I happened to have that switched that off because I was making some banking calls earlier in the day I had a PAX in the car at the time so at first I ignored it but then the call came again So against my better judgement I answered I am paraphrasing here a little bit but the person on the line said he was calling from Uber support and that since I was a stellar driver Uber was going to give me  I told him I had a fare and he said he would call back  minutes later he did He repeated his claim that he was going to give me  I parked the car and he proceeded to give my instructions on how to claim my cash This involved changing the listed phone number in the app to one I did not know and then adding a debit card number to my cash out list I went along with what he told me to do but all the time I kept thinking something is not right Before he could finish the process I hung up on him and tried to call Uber support But of course it was in the evening and they are closed until Monday Al the time the number came up again several times and then I got a text stating to call him back when I was ready to finish verification for my money I am not going to do anything until I can verify this guy is who he says he is by calling Uber support Monday when they are open

Was this a scam I dont know But there is an old saying When something seems to be to good to be true it probably is Also if you get a phone call in the middle of the night with a person wanting to give you money alarm bells should be ringing

I am pretty sure I almost lost a weeks worth of pay by cashing out to a strange debit card number I am glad I wised up in time

So this is a heads up to all drivers there is some sort of scam targeting drivers out there Beware of unknown calls offering you money
Name: Mr.Do

clean_story:
Several days ago when it snowed in Chicago I think it was  inches I was doing my shift overnight and saw at least  cars get stuck in the snow during my overnight shift I am reminded of this as it is snowing hard right now on my night shfit Cars would be turning from the main street into a side street that was unplowed and would get stuck immediately I am reminded of seeing roaches simply walking into a roach motel as a kid It was so sad I carried a shovel with me in the car because I knew what would happen 

I was able to save a few people by helping them dig out in between deliveries and pickups But I definitely could not save all of them When I did have one pax in my Uber another car did swerve in front of me and almost hit us and slid backwards into a ditch It was probably just a few feet away I was driving so slowly so I was able to avoid himher It was the first BIG snowfall in Chicago in many years so I suppose that people were not used to it 

It was really sobering to see all the stuck cars I myself only stuck to the main roads which were well plowed and avoided any side streets which were not well plowed Wait times I heard from pax were over an hour around  am I was in a far suburb When I picked some of them up they were really grateful that someone was still out to get them One guy actually said his exact words Sir you are like an angel that God sent to me tonight 

The surge was good about  per ride I know I have seen surges much larger but in Chicago that is pretty big
Name: Young Kim

clean_story:
Disclaimer Ive written a couple lighthearted dumb posts on this forum but this story is more serious and dark I dont know if its even appropriate to  It involves someone who passed away from a drug overdose and it might be triggering to some I mean no harm to the family or anyone who has lost someone to drugs or mental health Please seek help if you or someone you know is thinking about hurting themselves Suicide prevention hotline 



This story happened about  years ago in San Francisco It was a chilly night with no fog and a stiff breeze Its about am that night I think it was like a Tuesday or something Basically dead on the ride front Anyways as Im sitting waiting for a ping I notice a guy in a nice suite slumped over on the corner of the sidewalk People were passing by and just stepping over him Being in San Francisco there is homeless people and drug use everywhere so people are immune to this kind of stuff but something was off He had a suite on and looked different from the everyday bum I told myself dont worry about it hes just drunk I was telling myself not to go over and check but Im looking at this dude not move and looking stone cold dead so I decided to get out of my car and go investigate Well turns out hes alive barely I shake him awake and hes moving and grumbling some nonsense I call  which in San Francisco isnt very useful The operator on the line is asking me sir is he breathing Im trying to convey to her that hes moving but I think hes just drunk or something She says something that would ultimately cost him his life She asked me Sir do you want us to send an ambulance We get a lot of these calls and if he seems ok maybe you can take him to a hospital if its safe for you I was a bit surprised by that response I was just asked to put him in my Lyft and drive him to the hospital I end up rolling him over hes younger maybe  a good looking and clean cut Asian dude I carry him to my car and sit him upright Hes fumbling over but I manage to strap him in my back seat I start driving him to the nearest hospital ER While we are driving Im asking what his parents number is so I can let them know hes in the hospital He hands me his phone and after not unlocking it Im forced to use his finger print to unlock it I get in his phone and its all in a different language I find a number he last texted in I message and copy it into my phone I finish driving him to the hospital I turn around and look at him and hes dead Like straight up eyes rolled back dead I run in to the ER heart pounding out of my chest thinking Jesus Christ I have a dead man in my car The ER lady at the front desk hits the emergency button and a team of people rush out with a gurney and load him out of my car and wheel him into the ER I dont know what to text to the number who it is or what I should say I ended up saying I found a man and took him to the hospital found your number in his phone said my name and the hospital he was at and that was that I get a call back a week later Its the person I texted The man tells me the guy passed away from a drug overdose and mentioned he was his boyfriend and that the guy was depressed because he had just lost his law license and had a drug problem and they had just broken up The boyfriend cried but seemed almost relieved mentioning he had been a major burden on people Like dang dude he just died and your still gonna talk bad about him Definitely a bad break up It got weird after he offered to have my girlfriend and I have dinner at his restaurant for free for trying to save of his ex He said this after he finished crying on the phone as I told him about the guys last moments Anyways this still haunts me to this day Always get the ambulance if your unsure dont let  convince you otherwise 



End of story
Name: JohnJames8678

Saturday morning around  AM I get a Comfort ride ping I recognize the name I took them there earlier As I pull up there is a Sheriff car blocking one of the entrances his lights were off I see a deputy shinning his flash light around in the trees and dumpster area The PAX walk past the sheriffs car and get in my car Place is usually still pretty packed at this time the parking lot is pretty much empty

We pull out and as I am going down the side road toward the main road I pass a couple more deputy cars heading toward the restaurant Lights were off I get out on to the main road heading toward their resort and not even a mile down the road I get lit up by a deputy I pull over and the PAX are like what the hell Im like I have no idea Im not speeding and I made sure I came to a complete stop at both stop signs I went through

I pull over and start getting my license registration and proof of insurance ready turn on the interior lights roll down all the windows and place my hands on top of the steering wheel I look in my driver rearview mirror and dont see anything I look in the windshield rearview mirror and catch a glimpse of movement on the passenger side I look in the passenger side rearview mirror and see a female deputy reach over and touch the back of my car with her left hand then I see she has her gun drawn in her right hand

She gets to the rear passenger window and looks in and says you are not the car we are looking for you can go Before I know what is going on she is back in her car and driving off

Are you a hobby driver Do you know who these guys are Well

Me Hey I also do RS hows it been going for you in Tucson

clean_story:
Here in Pensacola Florida passengers often ask how I did during the worst of the pandemic lockdowns and such They ask it in a concerned tone of voice as if they assume Ive done poorly But I tell em Great The truth is that I did not miss a day of work and I did not see any loss of business I attribute this to two things

 There are plenty of people in my town who had to work  those employed by convenience stores and fastfood joints nursing homes and restaurantsin other words essential or exempted businesses Many of my passengers were from a ahem lowerincome strata of society and to work But also many of them did not have cars and have come to rely on RS to get to and from work



 I assume that a lot of UberLyft drivers are older and many of them may have health issues otherwise theyd all probably have regular jobs My thinking goes that because many RS drivers fall into one or more atrisk category they stopped driving out of as they say on TV an abundance of caution End result Fewer drivers on the road competing for the rides

Whatever the actual reasons I did not have to stop driving nor did I lose any income at all in  I hit all of my admittedly modest daily income targets and I found that I could achieve them in fewer hours per day than in the prepandemic days Most days it was nonfriggin stoppingpingping I worked hard all my life I did not take this job so I could work hard some more Sometimes Id kind of feel guilty about stopping early and abandoning passengers who needed rides But after my second beer those feeling passed

I know that my experience here in my town was probably not typical but I hope that all of us who continued to drive through this winkwink pandemic did as well
Name: Aw Jeez

clean_story:
Im usually much more vigilant even militant about this especially during Friday and Saturday night driving which is drunk and druggy primetime around here For example if I roll up to a bar club at night on weekends Ill make very sure that a pax doesnt look too wasted before I unlock and I let them in my nice car to lower the chances of them throwing up getting too belligerent etc just being in insufferable pain the butt

So I have no idea how and why I let my guard last night but I did

I rolled into a higher end residential neighbor not bar or club for a PU parked and was fiddling with my phone not paying close enough attention to my environmentsome how I left the car doors unlocked

The next thingI heard the door open I said hi and introduced myself then turned my head to see two women straining to hoist this big   burly semiconscious drunk into my nice car Oh hell no ladies I responded seriously you cant thank youbye they cut me off then took off leaving this incoherent drunk who slouched horizontally across my backseat and went to sleep even snoring

I checked the ride andit was long like  mins but most of it on the interstate and at least it was another residential not commercial address so I could probably get him out the car and to the doorstep or on his lawn He was too blasted to be any trouble to me though he might throw up in route

I decided the quickest route out of this situation would be to simply hustle him from point A to point B

Thats what I did

I gunned it up the  to cut the time got him to the addressparked and woke him up

He was still too sloshed to talk butlooked slowing around seemed to recognize his place and pointed at it and grinned

Ok great I helped him out the car and luckily the  min cat nap revived enough of his motor abilities that he could sorta make a slow zigzap like walk to his house without my help I wanted as little end game involvement as possibleI watched him enter ended the ride then got the hell outta there logged off and went home No more Friday night drunks
Name: #1husler

clean_story:
What I like about deliveries is that we are informed of the expected pay and trip information without the need of maintaining the  AR nonsense While the way we run our business can differ greatly it is fair to assume that it only makes sense to accept those with promised tips 

Contrary to my belief it looks like there are always drivers who love taking unprofitable offers that we would decline in a split second probably because of the combination of more rookies  desperate drivers  add any plausible causes here As you may know Home Depot Apple and Best Buy deliveries are basically community service long trip   tip To test the hypothesis that lowball offers are never left behind I have tried bidding a few Sometimes when I was still reading the details dimensions weight etc the offer had already expired eeking

Can there be a possibility that I may have missed something According to my experience never expect a dime of tip if a customer does not offer any upfront although there can be miracles One time I was tipped  cash for delivering  large bottles of bleach and a microwave oven Does the vast majority of our fellow drivers accept what are made available Every time seeing a ridiculous offer gets accepted in no time I cannot help but shaking my head
Name: MyJessicaLS430
